verse_text: Ȧkȧfȧ ka rȧkom ra Yisɔs Krayst ɔWan ka Debid, ɔwan ka Ebraham, ki ake.
Ebrahamȧŋ ɔ kom Aysakȧŋ, Aysak ɔ kom Yekɔbȧŋ, Yekɔb ɔ kom Yudasȧŋ yi aŋwɔnt ŋɔŋ aruni.
Yudasȧŋ ɔ kom Ferɛs yi Sara ka Temar; Ferɛsȧŋ ɔ kom Hɛsrɔn; ka Hɛsrɔnȧŋ ɔ kom Aram;
Eramȧŋ ɔ kom Aminadab; ka Aminadabȧŋ ɔ kom Nesɔn; ka Nesɔnȧŋ ɔ kom Salmɔn;
ɔwa Salmɔnȧŋ ɔ kom Bowas ka Rehab; ka Bowasȧŋ ɔ kom Obɛd ka Ruth; ka Obɛdȧŋ ɔ kom Yɛsi;
Yɛsiȧŋ ɔ kom Debidȧŋ ɔbȧy; ka Debid ɔbȧy ɔ kom Sɔlɔmɔn ka ɔrani ka Urayas;
Sɔlɔmɔnȧŋ ɔ kom Rihoboam; ka Rihoboamȧŋ ɔ kom Abaya; ka Abayaŋ ɔ kom Asa;
Asaŋ ɔ kom Yehosafat; ka Yehosafatȧŋ ɔ kom Yoram; ka Yoramȧŋ ɔ kom Osaya;
ka Osayaŋ ɔ kom Yotham; ka Yothamȧŋ ɔ kom Ehas; ka Ehasȧŋ ɔ kom Hɛsikaya;
ka Hɛsikayaŋ ɔ kom Manasɛ; ka Manasɛŋ ɔ kom Emɔs; ka Amanȧŋ ɔ kom Yosaya;
ka Yosayaŋ ɔ kom Yɛkonaya, yi aŋwɔnt ŋɔŋ aruni ka ȧŋlɔkɔ a kera ŋa ro Babilɔn.
Kǝdarǝŋ ka ma a kera ŋa ro Babilɔn-e, Yɛkonayaŋ ɔ kom Salathiyɛl; ka Salathiɛlȧŋ ɔ kom Sirɔbabɛl;
ka Sirɔbabɛlȧŋ ɔ kom Abiud; ka Abiudȧŋ ɔ kom Ilayakim; ka Ilayakimȧŋ ɔ kom Asɔr;
ka Asɔr ɔ kom Sedɔk; ka Sedɔkȧŋ ɔ kom Akim; ka Akimȧŋ ɔ kom Ilayud;
ka Ilayudȧŋ ɔ kom Ɛliyesar; ka Ɛliyesarȧŋ ɔ kom Mȧthan; ka Mȧthanȧŋ ɔ kom Yekɔb;
ka Yekɔbȧŋ ɔ kom Yosɛf ɔwos ka Meri ɔwe kom Yisɔsȧŋ, ɔwe a bont Krayst.

Ɔwa takomra bɛ kǝtǝp ka Ebraham haŋ ka Debid tǝ yi tǝkomra tɔfɔt tanlɛ; ɔwa kǝtǝp ka Debid haŋ ka kakera ŋa ro Babilɔn tǝ yi tǝkomra tɔfɔt tanlɛ; ɔwa kǝtǝp ka kakera ŋa ro Babilɔn haŋ ka Kraist-e, tǝ yi tǝkomra tɔfɔt tanlɛ.
Ɔwa kakom ka Yisɔs kǝ yi yaŋ; ma Yosɛf ɔ po fath Meriȧŋ ɔkara ka Yisɔs, yeŋka aŋ yiranɛ-e, a fir kǝpa ɔ yi ukor ka ɔYina mǝsǝm.
Kɛrɛ Yosɛfȧŋ ɔwos kɔŋ-e, ma ɔ yi wuni lompi-e, ɔ yema hɛ wɔŋȧ kɔ mǝlap-e, ɔ nanɛ tǝ kǝter kɔ sɔy.
Kɛrɛ ma ɔ tȧmtȧmnɛ mȧtȧy ame-e, kǝla, ɔmaleka ka ɔMarki ɔ tɔrinɛ ro ŋɔŋ rǝ mǝrei, kɔ pa, Yosɛf, munɔ ɔwan ka Debid, te nesa tǝ kǝba ro mu Meriȧŋ, ɔrani ka mu-e, kotȧy-e ɔ yi ukor ka ɔYina mǝsǝm.
Ɔ tǝ kom wath uruni. Ɔwa mǝ yi tǝ kǝbont kɔ ŋes Yisɔs, kotȧy-e kɔnɔ mǝ kisis aŋfǝm ŋɔŋ ka ɛhakɛ yaŋ.
Ȧte bɛ tǝ yɔnɛ kȧmȧ ȧrim ra ɔMarki rǝ lasǝr ka tapa ta aŋnabi-e, kepa
Kǝla, ufanɛ ɔ tǝ gbasi kor, Ɔ tǝ kom wath uruni, Ɔwa a tǝ bont kɔ ŋes, Imanuɛl, (aŋa a tepa kǝpa Kuruȧŋ ɔ yi dɛ yi saŋ).
Ɔwa ma Yosɛf ɔ thǝmɛ ka mȧrey mɔŋ-e, ɔ yɔ mɔ mǝ ɔmaleka ka ɔMarki ɔ yamari kɔ, kɔ gbasi ɔrani kɔŋ ro seth kɔŋ.
Kɛrɛ ɔ tɛ hɛ kɔ haŋ ɔ po kom ɔwan kɔŋ uruni utɔtɔkɔ. Ka a bont kɔ ŋes Yisɔs.
Ɔwa ma a kom Yisɔsȧŋ ro Bɛthlihɛm ȧke ro Yudia ka mȧrey ma Hɛrɔd ɔbay-e, kǝla, afǝm atempi aŋ der ro Yerusalɛm kǝyɛfȧ ro thɔrɔŋ,
kaŋ pa, Kɔn-a ɔwe a kom ubȧy ka aŋYuda-a? kotȧy-e sǝ po nənk akɔs kɔŋ ro thɔrɔŋ, ɔwa sǝ der tǝ kǝbatho kɔ.
Ma Herodȧŋ ɔbȧy ɔ tǝl ti-e, pǝ sɔmpa kɔ yi aŋfǝm bɛ ro Yerusalɛm.
kɔ thoŋkla aŋfode ȧbana yi aŋkarmɔkɔ ŋa aŋfǝme, ɔ yifǝth ŋa ta ro a yi tǝ kǝkom ɔKrayst.
kaŋ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Ro Bɛthlihɛm ȧke ka ȧŋthɔf ŋa ro Yudia; kotȧy-e yaŋ ɔnȧbi ɔ gbal kǝpa,
Munɔ Bɛthlihɛm, ka ȧŋthɔf ŋa Yuda, Mǝ yi hɛ ulɔl pǝthas aŋkərbomp ŋa aŋ Yuda; kotȧy-e ugbǝkȧ ɔ tǝwur ro mu Ɔwe mǝ yi ɔbumǝr ka aŋfǝm a mi aŋIsrɛl.
Ka Herodȧŋ ɔ tela aŋfǝm atempi sɔy, kɔ yifǝth ŋa finɔ ta ȧŋlɔkɔ aŋa akɔs kǝ tɔrinɛ.
kɔ som ŋa ro Bɛthlihɛm, kɔ pa, Kɔnɛ nu, thɛns ɔfinɔ ta ɔwath. Bepi nǝ po fir kɔ-e, de nu tɔri mi, kȧmȧ minɛ sɔ i gbǝli kɔ bȧtho kɔ.
Maŋ po tǝla ɔbay-e, aŋ kɔnɛ ro Bɛthlihɛm, ka akɔs ȧke aŋ nənk ro thɔrɔŋ kǝ tǝma ŋa kǝdi haŋ kǝ re tǝma rokɔm ka ɔdɛr ro ɔwath ɔ yi.
Maŋ nənk akɔs-e, aŋ selanɛ mǝbɔnɛ mǝbana.
Maŋ po wɔŋ ka ȧŋseth-e, aŋ nənk ɔwath yi ɔkara kɔŋ Meriȧŋ, kaŋ gbǝpsa, aŋ bȧtho kɔ. Ɔwa maŋ po kanthi ɛbɛnɛnɛ yaŋ-e, aŋ sɔŋ kɔ ɛboya; mǝbɔŋɔ-o, agboŋgbo-o yi aŋma.
Ɔwa, ma Kuruȧŋ ɔ maŋ ŋa rǝ mǝrei kȧmȧ aŋ te kȧlanɛ ka Herod-e, aŋ kȧlanɛ ka ȧŋthɔf ŋaŋ rǝ roŋ dǝlɔm.

Ɔwa maŋ po kɔnɛ-e, kǝla, umȧleka ka ɔMarki ɔ tɔrinɛ ka Yosɛf rǝ mǝrei, ɔ pa, Yokanɛ mǝ gbasi ɔwath yi ɔkara kɔŋ, mǝ gbukɛ mǝ kɔ ro Iyipt, kȧmȧ mǝ yi ri haŋ i kanɛ mu; kotȧy-e Herodȧŋ ɔ tǝ thɛns tǝ kǝdif ɔwath.
kɔ yokanɛ, ɔ gbasi ɔwath yi ɔkara kɔŋ ka tȧtȧk, ɔ kɔnɛ ro Iyipt.
kɔ yi ri haŋ rafi ra Hɛrɔd; kȧmȧ ȧrim ra ɔMarki rǝ lasǝr ara ɔ pa ka kasǝŋ ka ɔnȧbi, I po tela ɔwan kȧmi tǝ kǝwur ro Iyipt.

Herodȧŋ, ma ɔ nənk kǝpa aŋfǝm atempi aŋ po pǝŋis kɔ-e, ɔ bansȧ haŋ, kɔ som afǝm tǝ kǝdifǝth aŋfɛth aruni bɛ ro Bɛthlihɛm yi ka mȧgbȧp mati bɛ, aŋfɛth aŋa bȧk tǝren tǝrǝŋ yi aŋa te tha bekȧ yi-e, mɔ mǝ ȧŋlɔkɔ aŋ yi aŋa ɔ gbɛlɛŋ aŋfǝm atempi.
Ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati ȧrim ra Yɛrimaya ɔnȧbi rǝ lasǝr, ara pa,
A tǝla rim ro Rama, Kǝbok yi rǝbora rǝbana. Retɛl ɔ bok ta aŋwuth ŋɔŋ; Ɔ selɔ hɛ a thɔnthɔ kɔ, pǝkasifɛ aŋ yi hɛ sɔ.
Kɛrɛ ma Herodȧŋ ɔ fi-e, umalek ka ɔMarki ɔ tɔrinɛ ka Yosɛf ro Iyipt rǝ mǝrey,
kɔ pa, Yokanɛ mǝ gbasi ɔwath yi ɔkara kɔŋ, mǝ kȧlanɛ ka ȧŋthɔf ŋa Isrɛl, kotȧy-e aŋfǝm aŋa thɛns tǝ kǝdif ɔwath-e aŋ po fi thɔŋ.
Kɔ yokanɛ ɔ gbasi ɔwath yi ɔkara kɔŋ-e, kɔ der ka ȧŋthɔf ŋa Isrɛl.
Kɛrɛ ma ɔ tǝl kǝpa Arkiliyɔsȧŋ ɔ sara ka aŋni ŋa ɔkas kɔŋ Herod-e, ɔ nesa tǝ kǝkɔ ri. Ɔwa ma Kuru ɔ maŋ kɔ rǝ mǝrey-e, ɔ kɔnɛ ka mȧgbȧp ma ro Kalili.
kɔ der, ɔ yirȧ ka kȧpet ȧke ma tela Nasarɛth; kȧmȧ ȧrim ra ɔnȧbi rǝ lasǝr ara pa, A ba kǝbont kɔ uNasarɛth.
Ka mȧrey mati Yɔnȧŋ ɔBaftays ɔ wur gbafǝth, kɔ tamǝs ka aŋwula ŋa ro Yudia, ɔ pa,
Thupi nu, kotȧy-e rȧbȧy ra ro riyana rǝ po fat.
kotȧy-e ta ɔwe ɔnȧbi Aysayaŋ ɔ fɔf ma ɔ pa, Ȧrim ra ukin ɔwe gbelegbele ro wula, ɔ pa, Bɛnɛnɛ nu aroŋ da ɔMarki, Lompǝs nu asoŋ tɔŋ.
Yɔnȧŋ ɔ wɔŋ ruma ra aŋfon ŋa ȧyɔkmɛ, ɔwa ɔ senɛ ȧthɛbɛŋ ŋa areka. Ɛdi yɔŋ ɛ yi ɛlama yi rǝmai.
Ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati afǝm agbȧthi aŋ kɔ ro ŋɔŋ kǝwur ro Yerusalɛm yi ro Yudia bɛ, yi ka aŋgbaŋ bɛ aŋa fatǝr ro Yɔrdan.
kɔ baftays ŋa ro Yɔrdan maŋ gbithanɛ ɛhakɛ yaŋ.
Kɛrɛ ma ɔ nənk aFaresi yi aSadusi agbȧthi aŋ der kȧmȧ ɔ baftays ŋa, ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Naŋ, na rȧkomra ra ɛgbɔrɔ, kanɛ maŋ nu tǝ kǝgbukɛ rabaŋ ara mǝ der-e?
Tiyȧŋ kȧrȧ nu mǝkomi mǝbeki ta kǝthupi.
Ɔwa te nu nanɛ ka ɛmerȧ ɛ nu kǝpa, Sǝ ba Ebraham ta ɔkas kȧsu; kotȧy-e i kanɛ nu Kuruȧŋ ɔ gbǝli yokas awuth ta Ebraham ka masar ame.
Ɔwa ka-ake a po thɔ bot kabap ka aŋthǝŋk ŋa ɛyint. Tiyȧŋ, ŋǝnt o ŋǝnt aŋa mǝ te wur mǝkomi mǝfinɔ-e, a tǝ tap ŋi, a tǝ fitha ŋi ro nȧnt.
Minɛŋ yathi, i baftays nu yi mȧnt ka kǝthupi, kɛrɛ ɔwe mǝ der kǝdarǝŋ kȧmi kɔnɔ thasi mi afɔsɔ. I bek hɛ tǝ kǝwop ɛkɔftha yɔŋ. Ɔ tǝ baftays nu yi ɔYina mǝsǝm yi nȧnt.
Aŋfuŋa ŋɔŋ aŋ yi ka kȧta kɔŋ, ɔ tǝ gbǝl aŋgbethe ŋɔŋ gbǝraŋ, ɔwa ɔ tǝ thoŋkla apǝla pɔŋ ro fuŋk, kɛrɛ ɛfuk-e, ɔ tǝ thɔi yi rǝ nȧnt nǝte dimsɛ.
Ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ wur ro Kalili, ɔ der ro Yɔrdan ka Yɔn, kȧmȧ ɔ baftays kɔ.
Kɛrɛ Yɔnȧŋ ɔ yema bɛnt kɔ, ɔ pa, Pǝ mar munɔ mǝ baftays mi, kɛrɛ mǝ der ro mi-i?
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Ta pǝ yi yaŋ ka-ake, kotȧy-e ya pǝ mar sǝ lasǝr mȧlompi bɛ. Kɔ selɔ ɔ baftays kɔ.
Ma a po baftays Yisɔs-e, ɔlɛmp wati ɔ wur ro mȧnt; ka ȧkȧriyana kǝ kanthɛ, kɔ nənk ɔYina ka Kuru ɔ thor mɔ kǝpǝrǝm ɔ thorǝr kɔ,
ka rim rǝ wur ka Kuru, rǝ pa, Ɔwe-e, kɔnɔ yi ɔWan kȧmi ubɔthǝr, ka ɔwe i ba mǝbɔnɛ.
Ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati ɔYina ɔ kera Yisɔsȧŋ ro wula kȧmȧ Sethani ɔ gbɔns kɔ.
Ma ɔ po wop asum mǝrei tǝgba tǝrǝŋ pali gbɛsȧŋ, dor rǝ wop kɔ.
Ka ɔgbɔns ɔ bek-e, ɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Bepi munɔ yi ɔWan ka Kuru-e, yamari kȧmȧ masar ame mǝ sǝkɛ tǝbo.
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs ɔ pa, A po gbal kǝpa, Wuni ɔ ŋesǝm hɛ rǝ kǝbo gbo son, kɛrɛ rǝ rim o rim ara wur ka kasǝŋ ka Kuru.
Ka Sethaniȧŋ ɔ kera kɔ ka kȧpet kǝsǝm, kɔ tǝmǝr kɔ rokɔm ka ȧŋseth ŋa Kuru, ɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ,
Bepi mǝ yi ɔWan ka Kuru-e, tǝlpɛ roratha, kotȧy-e a po gbal kǝpa, Ɔ tǝ yamari aŋmȧleka ŋɔŋ ta ȧtȧ mu, Ɔwa aŋ tǝ kɛkǝr mu ka mȧta maŋ Ta thani mǝ gbuŋanɛ akatǝk ka mu rǝ ȧsar.
Yisɔs ɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, A po sɔ gbal kǝpa, Te mɛmǝr ɔMarki ɔKuru ka mu.
Ka Sethaniȧŋ ɔ kera kɔ sɔ ka kǝteŋ kǝbɔli rǝkɔm, kɔ tɔri kɔ tabȧy bɛ ta ȧdȧru, yi ɛyiki yati.
kɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, I ti sɔŋ mu mayɛt ame bɛ-e bepi mǝ gbǝpsa, ɔwa mǝ bȧtho mi.
Ka Yisɔs ɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Sethani, sək mi rȧŋ! kotȧy-e a po gbal kǝpa, Mǝ yi tǝ kǝbatho ɔMarki ɔKuru ka mu, ɔwa kɔnɔ gbo son mǝ mǝ yɔna.
Ka Sethaniȧŋ ɔ ter kɔ, ka aŋmȧleka aŋ der aŋ yɔna kɔ.
Ma Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ tǝl kǝpa a bot Yɔnȧŋ ka ȧŋseth ŋa tǝrǝŋka-e, ɔ kɔnɛ ro Kalili.
kɔ wur ro Nasarɛth, ɔ der yirȧ ro Kepaniyɔm ȧke yi ro baŋ rayɛr, ka mȧnǝnkǝra ma ro Sɛbulɔn yi Nafthalim.
Kama tǝ lasǝr ȧte Isaya ɔnȧbi ɔ pa, kǝpa,
Aŋthɔf ŋa ro Sɛbulɔn, yi ȧŋthɔf ŋa ro Nafthalim, Kǝbalǝr ro baŋ Yɔrdan mɔri, Ka Kalili ka tȧbona tǝlɔm,
Aŋfǝm aŋa yirȧ ka ȧŋsum Aŋ nənk kǝwalɛ kǝbana; Ɔwa kǝwalɛ kǝ put ro ŋaŋ Aŋa yirȧ ka ɔdɛr yi ka ȧŋmumpǝl ŋa rǝfi.
Kǝtəp ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ tǝp kǝtam, ɔ pa, Thupi nu kotȧy-e rȧbȧy ra ro riyana rǝ po fat.
Ɔwa ma Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ kɔth kɔth rayɛr ka kȧbȧŋ ka ro Kalili-e ɔ nənk awɔnt aruni ŋarǝŋ, Symɔnȧŋ ɔwe a bont Pita, yi Andrɔŋ ɔwɔnt kɔŋ, aŋ bɔ fitha kǝpɛl ro baŋ, kotȧy-e aŋ yi alǝm.
kɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, De nu tȧŋ mi, i ti yɔ nu nǝ lǝm afǝm.
Ɔlɛmp wati aŋ tey tapɛl ta naŋ, kaŋ tȧŋ kɔ.
Ma ɔ wur ri-e, ɔ nənk awɔnt aruni ŋarǝŋ alɔm, Yemǝsȧŋ ɔwan ka Sɛbidi, yi ɔwɔnt kɔŋ Yɔnȧŋ, aŋ yi ro bil dɛ yi Sɛbidi ɔkas ka ŋaŋ, aŋ bɔ gbɛŋgbǝlɛ tapɛl taŋ. Kɔ tela ŋa.
Ɔlɛmp wati aŋ tey ȧŋbil yi ɔkas ka ŋaŋ, kaŋ tȧŋ kɔ.
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ kɔth ro Kalili bɛ, ɔ thǝksa ka ɛseth ɛgbanɛ, ɔ tamǝs ȧkɛra kǝfinɔ ka rȧbȧy, ɔ yeŋkǝs rǝtu o rǝtu kətɔŋ ka aŋfəm.
Ka ȧŋes ŋɔŋ aŋ gbanthɛnɛ ro Siria bɛ; kaŋ kȧrȧ ro ŋɔŋ aŋboma bɛ aŋa ba tǝtu yi ɛsɔmpanɛ ɛbaŋ ɛgbanthɛ tǝtǝp, ŋaŋ aŋa ba akǝrǝfi-o, tatuk-o, mȧthanthaŋ-o, ɔwa ɔ yeŋkǝs ŋa bɛ.
Ka suniya tǝbana tǝ tȧŋ kɔ kǝyɛfȧ ro Kalili, ro Dikapɔlis, ro Yerusalɛm, ro Yudia dɛ yi ro Yɔrdan mɔri.
Ma Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ nənk ȧsuniya-e, ɔ gbep ka kǝteŋ rokɔm. Ma ɔ po yira-e, aŋkarande ŋɔŋ aŋ fatǝr kɔ.
kɔ tǝp kǝthǝksa ŋa, ɔ pa,
Aruba ŋaŋ aŋa yi amɔnɛ rǝ ȧmerȧ, kotȧy-e ŋa ba rȧbȧy ra ro riyana.
Aruba ŋaŋ aŋa saŋ amɔl, kotȧy-e a ba kǝthɔnthɔ ŋa.
Aruba ŋaŋ aŋa ba ɛmerȧ ɛthoranɛ, kotȧy-e aŋ tǝ ba ȧŋthɔf mɔ kɛŋ.
Aruba ŋaŋ aŋa ba afela ta mȧlompi mɔ dor, kotȧy-e aŋ ba kǝnȧmrȧ.
Aruba ŋaŋ aŋa ba ȧney, kotȧy-e a tǝ ba ŋa ȧney.
Aruba ŋaŋ aŋa ba ɛmerȧ ɛfera, kotȧy-e aŋ ba kǝnǝŋk Kuru.
Aruba ŋaŋ aŋa yi awom, kotȧy-e a tǝ bont ŋa aŋwuth ŋa Kuru.
Aruba ŋaŋ aŋa a po sɔmpa salata mȧlompi, kotȧy-e ŋa ba rȧbȧy ra ro riyana.
Nǝ ba aruba bepi a sambos nu, ɔwa a sɔmpa nu, thalɔm a fɔf nu ɔlǝs rǝ rǝyem salata mi.
Sel nu mǝbɔnɛ, ta pǝ bɔnɛ nu ɔthasǝr, kotȧy-e ȧŋram a nu aŋ yi ȧbana ro riyana; ȧtesoma-e ya a sɔmpa aŋnabi aŋa yi thǝpaŋ.
Naŋ nǝ yi amɛr ma ȧdȧru, kɛrɛ bepi amɛr mǝ dim mabɔthi mati-e, ko rǝka rǝ mǝ bɔthǝs ma sɔ-e? Mǝ thesa hɛ sɔ ta rǝka o rǝka thambe a fitha ma, ɔwa afǝm aŋ nas ma.
Naŋ nǝ yi ȧŋmothȧ ŋa ȧdȧru. Kȧpet ȧke yi ka kǝteŋ rokɔm-e kǝ gbǝli hɛ maŋknɛ.
Ɔwa afǝm aŋ moth hɛ kǝmulɛ tǝ kǝbot ki rǝ ȧthunthȧ roratha-e, thambe aŋ bot ki rǝ ɔtǝmǝr, kȧmȧ kǝ mothǝr ŋa bɛ ro seth.
Yɔ nu kȧmȧ ȧŋmothȧ a nu aŋ gbɛntha rodi ka aŋfǝm, kȧmȧ aŋ nənk mȧyɔs ma nu mǝfinɔ, ɔwa aŋ yikis ɔKas ka nu ɔwe yi ro riyana.
Te nu nanɛ kǝpa i der tǝ kǝlǝsǝr aŋthɔ, thalɔm tapa ta aŋnabi. I de hɛ tǝ kǝlǝsǝr, kɛrɛ tǝ kǝlasǝr.
Tɛntɛnɛ i pa ro rɔnu, Haŋ ȧkȧriyana yi ȧdȧru ɛ thas-e, hali tȧy tǝlɔl thalɔm agbal ŋin ŋa aŋthɔ aŋ gbǝli hɛ dinɛ haŋ a po lasǝr ŋi bɛ.
Tiyȧŋ wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ sim ȧgbȧp alɔl ŋin ŋa ɛthɔ ɛye, ama ɔ thǝksa afǝm yaŋ-e, a tǝ bont kɔ ulɔl ka rȧbȧy ra ro riyana; kɛrɛ ɔwe mǝ wop ama ɔ thǝksa yi-e, a tǝ bont kɔ ubana ka rȧbȧy ra ro riyana.
Tiyȧŋ i pa ro rɔnu, Thambe mȧlompi ma nu mǝ thas mȧlompi ma aŋkarmɔkɔ yi aŋFarisi-e, rǝ roŋ o roŋ nǝ gbǝli hɛ wɔŋ ka rȧbȧy ra ro riyana.
Nǝ po tǝl kǝpa a pa ka aŋbȧki thǝpaŋ, Te dif wuni. Wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ dif wuni kǝsias-e, ɔ beki kȧmȧ ɔ sɔthɔ ȧthȧlǝr ka aŋthonkas.

Kɛrɛ minɛŋ i pa ro rɔnu, Wuni o wuni ɔwe ba mǝbaŋ ta ɔwɔnt kɔŋ-e, ɔ tǝ fumpɔ kasi ro bare; ɔwa wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ farki ɔwɔnt kɔŋ-e, ɔ tǝ fumpɔ kasi ka aŋSanhedrin; kɛrɛ wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ pa, Mun pǝŋk, ɔ tǝ fumpɔ kasi ro yahanama.
Tiyȧŋ bepi mǝ kȧrȧ ȧŋboya a mu ka ȧŋbɛsɛ-e, ɔwa mǝ kala ȧmerȧ kǝpa ɔwɔnt mu ɔ ba mǝbaŋ ta ȧtȧ mu-e;
tey ri ȧŋboya a mu, kɔnɛ mǝ mɔtha kȧl manɛ yi ɔwɔnt mu, kǝdarǝŋ kati mǝ der, mǝ sɔŋ ȧŋboya a mu.
Manɛ yi ɔtheranɛ ka mu ka ȧŋlɔkɔ na mǝ taŋanɛ ro roŋ yi kɔn; ta thani ɔtheranɛ ka mu ɔ lȧnki mu ka ɔthoŋkas, ɔwa ɔthoŋkas ɔ lȧnki mu ka ȧŋbɔy, ɔwa a tand mu ka ȧŋseth ŋa tǝrǝŋka.
Tɛntɛnɛ i kanɛ mu, mǝ ba hɛ kǝwur ri rǝ roŋ o roŋ haŋ mǝ poŋ ram aŋwankɔpɔ alǝpsɔ.
Nǝ po tǝl kǝpa a pa, Te yɔ kǝrǝp.
Kɛrɛ minɛȧŋ i pa ro rɔnu, Wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ kǝli wuni bom tǝ kǝfela kɔ-e, ɔ po yɔ kǝrǝp ka ȧŋmerȧ ŋɔŋ.
Bepi rafɔr ra mu rǝdiɔ rǝ yɔ mu mǝ pǝnthbǝla-e, kothi ri, fitha ri, kotȧy-e pǝ tǝ fisa mu bepi abɛm ŋin ŋa aŋdɛr a mu aŋ lǝsȧ-e, pǝthasi kǝfitha aŋdɛr a mu alolok ro yahanama.
Ɔwa bepi kȧta ka mu kǝdiyɔ kǝ yɔ mu mǝ pǝnthbǝla-e, gbǝk ki, fitha ki, kotȧy-e pǝ tǝ fisa mu bepi abɛm ŋin ŋa aŋdɛr a mu aŋ lǝsǝ pǝthasi kǝfitha aŋdɛr a mu alolok ro yahanama.
A po pa sɔ, Bepi wuni o wuni ɔ ter ɔrani kɔŋ-e, ta ɔ sɔŋ kɔ areka ŋa kasakanɛ;
kɛrɛ minɛȧŋ i pa ro rɔnu, Wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ ter ɔrani kɔŋ pǝ yi hɛ tȧ kǝrǝp-e, ɔ yɔ ɔbɛra ɔ sǝkɛ urǝpi, ɔwa wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ nȧntȧ kɔ ɔwe a po ter-e, ɔ yɔ kǝrǝp.
Nǝ po tǝl kǝpa a pa ka aŋbȧki thǝpaŋ, Te gbiŋ kǝgbiŋ ka rǝyem, kɛrɛ lasǝr ɛgbiŋ ɛ nu ka ɔMarki.
Kɛrɛ minɛȧŋ i pa ro rɔnu, Te gbiŋ hali, pǝ yi hɛ ka ȧkȧriyana, kotȧy-e kǝ yi kawaŋ ka rȧbȧy ra Kuru Mǝsaba,
pǝ yi hɛ ka ȧdȧru, kotȧy-e kǝ yi kȧpet ka ɔBȧy ubana.
Te gbiŋ ka rȧbomp ra mu, pǝkasifɛ mǝ gbǝli hɛ sǝki rafon ra mu rin rǝfera thalɔm rǝbi.
Kɛrɛ ta mapa ma mu mǝ yi Yao, Yao, thalɔm Yi thahɔ, Yi thahɔ; kotȧy-e tȧy o tȧy ȧte thas ȧte tǝ wur ka ɔlǝs.
Nǝ po tǝl kǝpa a pa, Rǝfɔr ta rǝfɔr, rǝsek ta rǝsek;
kɛrɛ minɛȧŋ i pa ro rɔnu, Te kasi mǝlǝs. Bepi wuni o wuni ɔ gbantha mu ka aŋkos ȧdiyɔ-e, lȧfthɛ kɔ aŋlɔm sɔ.
Ɔwa bepi wuni o wuni ɔ kera mu ro bare-e, ɔwa ɔ nɔy mu aruma ra mu-e, yɔ kȧmȧ ɔ ba sɔ kafɔl ka mu.
Bepi wuni o wuni ɔ kithinɛ mu tǝ kǝpȧyȧ kɔ ȧmayl ŋin-e, pȧyȧ kɔ yɛrǝŋ.
Sɔŋ ka ɔwe mǝ tholir mu, te pɛnsa ɔwuni ɔwe yema bɔr mu.
Nǝ po tǝl kǝpa a pa, Bɔthǝr ɔfatanɛ ka mu, ɔwa gbɛŋa ɔtheranɛ ka mu.
Kɛrɛ minɛȧŋ i pa ro nu, Bɔthǝr aŋtheranɛ a nu, ɔwa ramnɛ nu ta ȧtȧ ŋaŋ aŋa sɔmpa nu,
kȧmȧ nǝ yi aŋwuth ŋa ɔKas ka nu ɔwe yi ro riyana. Kotȧy-e ɔ yɔ aret rɔŋ rǝ putǝr ka aŋlǝs yi ka aŋfinɔ, ɔ somra akɔm ka aŋlompi yi ka aŋkǝnȧ.
Ȧtesoma-e bepi nǝ bɔthǝr gbo aŋa bɔthǝr nu-e, ko ȧrȧm naŋ mǝ nǝ sɔthɔ-e? Yaŋ tha aŋthoŋkla ɛfȧk aŋ yɔ sɔ-e?
Bepi nǝ kori aŋwɔnt nu gbo-e, ko tȧy tǝfinɔ tȧŋ nǝ yɔ pǝthas alɔm-e? Yaŋ tha tȧbona tǝlɔm mǝ aŋ yɔ sɔ-e?
Tiyȧŋ yi nu agbenthis mɔ mǝ ɔKas ka nu ɔwe yi ro riyana ɔ yi ugbenthis.
Botnɛ nu kȧmȧ nǝ te yɔ mȧlompi ma nu rodi ka aŋfǝm kȧmȧ aŋ nənk nu. Bepi pǝ yi yaŋ-e, nǝ sɔthɔ hɛ ȧrȧm kǝwur ka ɔKas ka nu ɔwe yi ro riyana.
Tiyȧŋ ma mǝ nǝ sɔŋ ɛboya-e, te nu fɛŋ kǝthɛma rodi ka nu mɔ mǝ ȧŋmunafȧki mǝ aŋ yɔ ka ɛseth ɛgbanɛ yi ka asoŋ-e, kȧmȧ aŋ sɔthɔ ayiki ka aŋfǝm. Tǝ tɛntɛnɛ i kanɛ nu, aŋ po sɔthɔ ȧŋrȧm ŋaŋ.
Kɛrɛ ma mǝ mǝ sɔŋ ɛboya-e, te selɔ kȧta ka mu kǝmɛrɔ kǝ tȧrȧ ȧte kȧta ka mu kǝdiyɔ kǝ yɔ;
kȧmȧ ɛboya ɛ nu ɛ yi rǝ agbundu, ɔwa ɔKas ka nu ɔwe nənk rǝ agbundu ɔ tǝ ram nu gbafǝth.
Ɔwa ma nǝ ramnɛ-e, te nu yi mɔ ȧŋmunafȧki, kotȧy-e aŋ bɔther kǝtǝma ka ɛseth ɛgbanɛ yi ka asoŋ tǝsakanɛ kȧmȧ aŋfǝm aŋ nənk ŋa. Tɛntɛnɛ i kanɛ nu, aŋ po sɔthɔ ȧŋrȧm ŋaŋ.
Kɛrɛ munɔŋ, bepi mǝ ramnɛ-e, wɔŋ ka ȧŋkonko a mu, ɔwa ma mǝ po kantha kadare ka mu-e, ramnɛ ka ɔKas ka mu ɔwe yi rǝ ɔmaŋknɛ, ɔwa ɔKas ka mu ɔwe nənk rǝ ɔmaŋknɛ ɔ tǝ ram mu gbafǝth.
Kɛrɛ ma nǝ ramnɛ-e, te nu fɔf sim tǝgbathi tǝyai, mɔ mǝ tȧbona tǝlɔm mǝ tǝ yɔ; kotȧy-e aŋ nanɛ kǝpa a tǝ tǝla ŋa ta tafɔf taŋ tǝgbathi.
Tiyȧŋ te nu yi mɔ ŋaŋ, ȧtesoma-e ɔKas ka nu ɔ tȧrȧ ɛyɛt ɛyɛ nǝ yema yeŋka nǝ yif kɔ.
Tiyȧŋ ramnɛ nu yaŋ; ƆKas kȧsu ɔwe yi ro riyana, kanka ȧŋes a mu aŋ yi ȧsǝm.
Kaŋkɔ rȧbȧy ra mu rǝ bek. Kaŋkɔ mȧselɔ ma mu mǝ yɔnɛ nɔru mɔ mǝ mǝ yɔnɛ ro riyana.
Yer su thonɔŋ ɛyɛt ɛdi ɛbeki su.
Tera su mȧtȧy ma su mǝlǝs, mɔ saŋ mǝ sǝ tera ŋaŋ aŋa yɔ su ɔlǝs.
Te su wɔŋȧ rǝ tȧy tǝgbɔns kɛrɛ wurɔ su ka mətȧy mǝlǝs; ȧtesoma-e munɔ ba rȧbȧy yi aŋfɔsɔ yi aŋyiki thȧnkȧŋ thǝbana, Amina.
kotȧy-e, bepi nǝ tera afǝm mȧtȧy maŋ mǝlǝs-e, ɔKas ka nu ro riyana ɔ tǝ tera nu sɔ,
kɛrɛ bepi nǝ tera hɛ afǝm mȧtȧy maŋ mǝlǝs-e, ɔKas ka nu ɔ ba hɛ kǝtera nu mȧtȧy ma nu mǝlǝs.
Ɔwa ma pǝ thas ri-e, bepi nǝ wop asum-e, te nu suma mɔ aŋyɔr; kotȧy-e aŋ lǝsǝr aser taŋ kȧmȧ aŋfǝm aŋ nənk kǝpa aŋ wop asum. Tǝ tɛntɛnɛ i kanɛ nu kǝpa aŋ po sɔthɔ ȧŋrȧm ŋaŋ.
Kɛrɛ munɔŋ, bepi mǝ wop asum, sop rȧbomp ra mu yi mȧro, ɔwa yak ȧder a mu,
kȧmȧ afǝm aŋ te nənk kǝpa mǝ wop asum-e, kɛrɛ ɔKas ka mu ɔwe yi rǝ ɔmaŋknɛ. Ɔwa ɔKas ka mu ɔwe nənk rǝ agbundu ɔ tǝ ram mu.
Te nu thoŋklanɛ tɛŋ ka ȧdȧru ro amɔrka yi magbak mȧ mǝ sɔm ti, dɛ yi akey mǝ aŋ bɛs tǝ kǝkeya.
Thoŋklanɛ nu gbo tɛŋ ro riyana, ro amɔrka yi mǝgbak mǝ gbǝli hɛ sɔm ti, ɔwa ro akey aŋ te bɛs, aŋ keya.
Ȧtesoma-e ro atɛŋ ta nu tǝ yi-e, rǝ ɛmerȧ ɛ nu ɛ tǝ yi sɔ.
ȧŋmothȧ ŋa aŋdɛr aŋ yi rafɔr. Tiyȧŋ bepi rafɔr ra mu rǝ yi rǝtempi-e, rǝ tǝ mothǝr aŋdɛr a mu bɛ.
Kɛrɛ bepi rafɔr ra mu rǝ yi rǝlǝs-e, aŋdɛr a mu bɛ aŋ tǝ la asum. Tiyȧŋ bepi ȧŋmothȧ aŋa yi mu aŋ yi asum-e, ȧŋsum ŋati a bana!
Wuni o wuni ɔ gbǝli hɛ bȧtho amarki ŋarǝŋ, kotȧy-e ɔ tǝ gbɛŋa ɔkin ɔwa ɔ tǝ bɔthǝr ɔlɔm; thalɔm ɔ tǝ gbapsa ɔkin, ɔwa ɔ tǝ sai ɔlɔm. Nǝ gbǝli hɛ bȧtho Kuru dɛ yi mǝbɔŋɔ.
Tiyȧŋ i kanɛ nu, te nu ba asoli ta ɛŋesǝm ɛ nu, ta ara mǝ nǝ di-e, thalɔm ta ara mǝ nǝ mun-e, ta a pa ras ta aŋdɛr a nu ta ara mǝ nǝ wɔŋ. Aŋesǝm aŋ thas hɛ yɛt ɛdi-i, ɔwa aŋdɛr aŋ thas hɛ ɛloprȧ-i?
Kǝli ɛbȧmp rokɔm-a, aŋ sak hɛ, aŋ rɔk hɛ, aŋ thonkla hɛ rǝ tǝfunk: kɛrɛ ɔKas ka nu ro riyana ɔ wɔnthǝr ŋa. Naŋ-e, nǝ thas hɛ ŋa mȧrǝŋ mȧrǝŋ-i?
Wuni reke kǝtɔŋ kȧnu mǝ gbǝli bȧr alonk ŋin ka kasaŋa kɔŋ, hali ɔ ba ti afela-e?
Ɔwa kɔyɛŋ nǝ ba asoli ta yɛt ɛloprȧ-e? Tȧmtȧmnɛ tȧyaba ta ro lal ma mǝ tǝ lɔkɔ; tǝ yɔ hɛ mǝpanth, tǝ sǝrǝm hɛ,
kɛrɛ i kanɛ nu-e, hali Sɔlɔmɔn ka aŋyiki ŋɔŋ bɛ ɔ lopra hɛ mɔ malɛŋi mati ame.
Ɔwa bepi Kuruȧŋ ɔ lonsǝr akereŋ ka ro lal yaŋ-e, ȧke yi thonɔŋ, ɔwa ninaŋ a fitha ki rǝ nȧnt nǝbana; thamsinɛ naŋ-e, nia afǝm ŋa kǝlanɛ kǝthan.
Tiyȧŋ te nu soli kǝpa, Ko mǝ sǝ di-e, thalɔm ko mǝ sǝ mun-e, ta a pa ras ko mǝ sǝ wɔŋ-e?
kotȧy-e ɛyɛt ɛye bɛ-e, yɛ tȧbona tǝlɔm mǝ tǝ thɛns, kɛrɛ ɔKas ka nu ro riyana ɔ tȧrȧ kǝpa nǝ yema ɛyɛt ɛye bɛ.
Kɛrɛ mɔtha nu thɛns rȧbȧy ra Kuru, dɛ yi mȧlompi mɔŋ, ɔwa ɔ tǝ bȧrȧ nu ɛyɛt ɛye bɛ.
Tiyȧŋ te nu ba asoli ta ninaŋ, ȧtesoma-e rasɔk ra ninaŋ rǝ tǝ ba aŋsoli ŋati. Mȧlǝs ma ȧŋrey mǝ beki ta ȧŋrey ŋati.
Te nu thonkas wuni, kȧmȧ a te thonkas nu.
kotȧy-e kathoŋkas ȧke mǝ nǝ thoŋkas-e kǝ mǝ a thonkas nu; ɔwa aŋthuntha aŋa mǝ nǝ thunth-e, ŋǝ mǝ a kȧl thuntha nu.
Ko tȧy tȧŋ mǝ nənk ȧŋpol aŋa yi ka rafɔr ra ɔwɔnt mu kɛrɛ mǝ te nənk kagboŋ ȧke yi ka rafɔr ra mu gbeŋ-e?
Thalɔm to mǝ gbǝli pa ka ɔwɔnt mu, Yɔ kȧmȧ i wurɔ ȧŋpol ka rafɔr ra mu, ma mǝ ba kagboŋ ka rafɔr ra mu-e?
Mun wuni yɔr, mɔtha wurɔ kagboŋ ka rafɔr ra mu, ɔwa kǝdarǝŋ kati mǝ tǝ gbǝli nənk gbǝraŋ tǝ kǝwura ȧŋpol ka rafɔr ra ɔwɔnt mu.
Te nu sɔŋ rǝka rǝsǝm ka ɛtǝn, ɔwa te fitha mȧthǝni ma nu ka tǝsɔp, ta thani aŋ nas ma ka ȧtȧtək taŋ, ɔwa aŋ fǝlɛ aŋ gbarigbari nu.
Yif nu, a tǝ sɔŋ nu. Thɛns nu, ɔwa nǝ tǝ fir. Gbȧtgbȧt nu ka kȧdare, a tǝ kanthɛ nu;
kotȧy-e wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ yif-e, ɔ tǝ sɔthɔ, ɔwe mǝ thɛns-e, ɔ tǝ fir, ɔwa ɔwe mǝ gbatgbat-e, a tǝ kanthɛ kɔ.
Wuni reke kǝtɔŋ ka nu-e, bepi ɔwan kɔŋ ɔ tholir kɔ kǝbo-e, mǝ ɔ sɔŋ kɔ asar-e?
Thalɔm bepi ɔ tholir kɔ kǝlop-e, mǝ ɔ sɔŋ kɔ abok-e?
Bepi naŋ ma nǝ yi alǝs-e, nǝ tȧrȧ kǝsɔŋ ɛboya ɛfinɔ ka aŋwuth a nu-e, pǝ tha gbethi ɔKas ka nu ɔwe yi ro riyana mǝ ɔ sɔŋ hɛ ɛyɛt ɛfinɔ ka ŋaŋ aŋa mǝ tholir kɔ-i?
Tiyȧŋ tȧy o tȧy ȧte nǝ yema kȧmȧ afǝm aŋ yɔ nu-e, ya nǝ yi tǝ kǝyɔ sɔ ro ŋaŋ; kotȧy-e ȧte tǝ yi aŋthɔ yi ɛmaŋ ya aŋnabi.
Wɔŋ nu ka kadare kǝthiŋkanɛ, kotȧy-e kadare kǝ yi kǝbana ɔwa aroŋ rǝ yi rǝbana ara lomanɛ ka kadinɛ, ɔwa ŋa agbȧthi aŋa wɔŋ ri.
Pǝkasifɛ kadare kǝ thiŋkanɛ ɔwa aroŋ rǝ lɔl ara lomanɛ ka aŋesǝm, ɔwa ŋa athȧn aŋa fir ri.
Botnɛ nu rǝ ȧmerȧ ta aŋnabi ayem aŋa mǝ der ro nu rǝ ɛlopra ya tǝlɔmɛ, kɛrɛ rokor aŋ yi tǝthɔlu alukǝs.
Nǝ tǝ tȧrȧ ŋa ka mȧkomi maŋ. Afǝm aŋ gbǝli pim mǝtiti rǝ tǝbȧnk-i, thalɔm mǝgbɔnɔ rǝ tǝsenduku-i?
Ya pǝ yi sɔ-e, ŋǝnt o ŋǝnt afinɔ aŋ kom mǝkomi mǝfinɔ, kɛrɛ ŋǝnt alǝs aŋ kom mǝkomi mǝlǝs.
Ŋǝnt afinɔ aŋ gbǝli hɛ kom mǝkomi mǝlǝs, ya pǝ yi sɔ, ŋǝnt alǝs aŋ gbǝli hɛ kom mǝkomi mǝfinɔ.
Ŋǝnt o ŋǝnt aŋa te kom mǝkomi mǝfinɔ-e, a tǝ tap ŋi, ɔwa a tǝ fitha ŋi ro nȧnt.
Tiyȧŋ nǝ tǝ tȧrȧ ŋa ka mȧkomi maŋ.
Pǝ yi hɛ wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ pa ro mi, Pa, Pa, kɔnɔ mǝ wɔŋ ka rȧbȧy ra ro riyana, kɛrɛ ŋaŋ gbo son aŋa mǝ yɔ mȧselɔ ma ɔKas kȧmi ɔwe yi ro riyana.
Agbȧthi aŋ tǝ pa ro rɔmi ka ȧŋrey ŋati, Pa, Pa, saŋ-e, sǝ la hɛ nȧbi ka ȧŋes a mu-i? Sǝ la hɛ wurɔ akǝrǝfi-i, sǝ la hɛ yɔ mǝyɔs mǝkabanɛ mǝgbathi ka ȧŋes a mu-i?
Ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati i ti kanɛ ŋa gbafǝth kǝpa, Thȧnkȧŋ i tɛ hɛ nu. Wur nu ro rɔmi, naŋ aŋa yɔ mǝyɔs mǝlǝs.
Tiyȧŋ wuni o wuni ɔwe tǝl ȧsim ta mi-e, ɔwa ɔ wop ti-e, ɔ bȧlȧnɛ mɔ wuni tempi ɔwe tǝmǝr ȧŋseth ŋɔŋ ka aŋgbalaŋ rokɔm.
Ka akɔm kǝ thuf, ɔwa ȧmȧnt mǝfɔl mǝ der, ka aŋfef aŋ sɔŋ aŋ sapǝth ȧŋseth ŋati; kɛrɛ aŋ fumpɔ hɛ, ȧtesoma-e a tǝmǝr ŋi ka aŋgbalaŋ rokɔm.
Kɛrɛ wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ tǝl ȧsim ta mi ȧte, ɔwa ɔ wop hɛ ti-e, ɔ bȧlȧnɛ mɔ wuni pǝŋk ɔwe tǝmǝr ȧŋseth ŋɔŋ ka kȧsǝnt.
Ka akɔm kǝ thuf, ɔwa ȧmȧnt mǝfɔl mǝ der, ka aŋfef aŋ sɔŋ, aŋ sȧpǝth ȧŋseth ŋati. Kaŋ fumpɔ, ɔwa kȧfumpɔ kati kǝ yi kǝbana.
Ka pǝ re yi ma Yisɔs ɔ gbanthi ȧsim ȧte, aŋfǝm aŋ kabanɛ ta kathǝksa kɔŋ,
kotȧy-e ɔ thǝksa ŋa mɔ wuni ɔwe ba afɔsɔ, pǝ yi hɛ mɔ aŋkarmɔkɔ aŋ yɔ.
Ɔwa ma ɔ thor ka kateŋ-e, suniya tǝbana tǝ tan kɔ.
Ka wuni ka rǝlel ɔ der ro ŋɔŋ, ɔ sɔna kɔ tǝwu, kɔ pa, Pa, bepi mǝ selɔ-e, mǝ gbǝli fethǝr mi.
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ thanthi kȧta kɔŋ, ɔ gboŋ kɔ, kɔ pa, I selɔ. Yi mun gbǝraŋ. Ka ɔlɛmp wati ralel rǝ pond kɔ.
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa ro rɔŋɔŋ, Botnɛ kȧmȧ mǝ te kanɛ ti wuni o wuni, kɛrɛ kɔnɛ mǝ tɔrinɛ ka aŋfode, kȧmȧ mǝ wurɔ asathka ȧte Mosisȧŋ ɔ yamari tǝ kǝyi mǝseri ro ŋaŋ.
Ɔwa ma ɔ wɔŋ ro Kapǝrneɔm-e, ukaptin ɔ der ro ŋɔŋ, kɔ nɛmthɛnɛ kɔ, ɔ pa,
Pa, ȧŋbɔy a mi ɔ fǝntha ro seth kȧmi, ɔ po gbɛthkɛ, ɔwa ɔ nakasi ɔthasǝr.
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, I ti der yeŋkǝs kɔ.
Ka ɔkaptin ɔ pa, Pa, i bek hɛ kǝpa munɔ mǝ wɔŋ ka ȧŋseth a mi. Pa gbo ȧrim, ɔwa ȧŋbɔy a mi ɔ tǝ yeŋk.
kotȧy-e minɛ sɔ i yi wuni ka afɔsɔ ratha, i ba aturgba roratha kȧmi. Ma i pa ka ɔkin ɔwe, Kɔnɛ, ɔwa ɔ tǝ kɔ. Ka ɔlɔm, Der, ɔwa ɔ tǝ der. Ka ȧŋbɔy a mi, Yɔ ȧte, ɔwa ɔ tǝ yɔ ti.
Ma Yisɔs ɔ tǝl ȧte, ɔ kabanɛ, kɔ pa ka ŋaŋ aŋa tȧŋ kɔ-e, Tǝ tɛntɛnɛ i pa ro rɔnu, i tha bǝp hɛ kǝlanɛ kǝbana kǝwunɔŋ, hali kǝtɔŋ ka aŋIsrɛl bɛ.
Ɔwa i kanɛ nu, agbȧthi aŋ tǝ wur ro thɔrɔŋ yi ro pil, aŋ tǝ yirȧ yi Ebraham, yi Aysak dɛ yi Yekɔb ka rȧbȧy ra ro riyana,
kɛrɛ a tǝ fitha aŋwuth ŋa rȧbȧy ka ȧŋsum rokaŋ, ro kǝkulɔ yi kȧŋȧkŋȧk ɛsek kǝ yi.
Ka ȧŋbɔy ŋɔŋ ɔ yeŋk ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati gbeŋ.
Ma Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ wɔŋ ka ȧŋseth ŋa Pitar-e, ɔ nənk ɔniŋkara kɔŋ ɔ fǝntha, ɔ tu mǝdɛr mǝgbipanɛ.
kɔ gboŋ kȧta kɔŋ, ka madɛr mǝgbipanɛ mǝ ter kɔ, kɔ yokanɛ, ɔ yɔna kɔ.

Ɔwa, ma Yisɔs ɔ nənk suniya tǝbana tǝ gbǝtɔsnɛ kɔ-e, ɔ yamari tǝ kǝfǝsi romɔri.

kaŋ kɔ thǝmi kɔ, aŋ pa, Pa, kisis su, sǝ dinɛ.

kaŋ sel ɛrɔŋ, aŋ pa, Ko tȧy tȧŋ saŋ sǝ ba yi munɔȧŋ-e, munɔ Yisɔs ɔWan ka Kuru-e? Mǝ po der nɔ tǝ kǝsɔmpa su yeŋka ȧŋlɔkɔ aŋ bek-i?

kɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Kɔnɛ. Kaŋ wur, kaŋ wɔŋ ka tǝsɔp. Ɔwa akuthi ka tǝsop kǝ gbuŋklɛ kǝder ka aŋtǝmp ŋa ro baŋ, kaŋ dinɛ ro mȧnt.
Ka ŋa aŋa bumǝr ŋa-e aŋ gbukɛ aŋ kɔ ro pet, aŋ tɔri koko bɛ, dɛ yi ȧte yɔnɛ ŋaŋ aŋa la ba aŋkǝrǝfi.
Ka aŋfǝm bɛ ro pet aŋ wur tǝ kǝgbans Yisɔsȧŋ. Maŋ nənk kɔ-e, aŋ nɛmthɛnɛ kɔ kȧmȧ ɔ wur ka ȧŋthɔf ŋaŋ.
kɔ bȧkȧ ka abil, ɔ fǝsi romɔri, kɔ der ka kȧpet kɔŋ.

Rǝ reke tha yi rǝfɔi tai-e, tǝ kǝpa, A po tera mu ɛhakɛ ɛ mu, thalɔm tǝ kǝpa, Yokanɛ, mǝ kɔth-e?

kɔ yokanɛ, ɔ kɔnɛ ro seth kɔŋ.

Ɔwa ma Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ wur ri-e, ɔ nənk wuni ɔwe a bont Mathiu, ɔ yirȧ ka ɔdɛr ro mǝ a gbasi ɛfȧk. Kɔ pa ro rɔŋɔŋ, Taŋ mi. Kɔ yokanɛ, ɔ tȧŋ kɔ.
Ka pǝ re yi ma Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ yirȧ ka kǝdi ro seth-e, afǝm aŋa gbasi ɛfȧk yi afǝm ŋa ɛhakɛ agbȧthi aŋ der aŋ yirȧ yi kɔn dɛ yi aŋkarande ŋɔŋ.
Ma aŋFarisi aŋ nənk ti-e, aŋ pa ka aŋkarande ŋɔŋ, To pǝ som ɔkarmɔkɔ ka nu mǝ ɔ di yi ŋaŋ aŋa gbasi ɛfȧk dɛ yi afǝm ŋa ɛhakɛ-e?
Ma Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ tǝl ti-e, ɔ pa, Ŋaŋ aŋa yi ayenki mǝdɛr aŋ yema hɛ udamǝr, kɛrɛ aŋtui ŋa yema udamǝr.
Kɛrɛ kɔnɛ nu kȧmȧ nǝ kɔ thǝkǝs ȧte, I yema ȧney, sathka thahɔ; ȧtesoma-e i der hɛ tǝ kǝmuti aŋlompi-e, kɛrɛ i der tǝ kǝmuti aŋfǝm ŋa ɛhakɛ tǝ kǝthupi.
Ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati aŋkarande ŋa Yɔn aŋ der ro ŋɔŋ, aŋ pa, To som saŋ yi aŋFarisi sǝ wop asum katkat, kɛrɛ aŋkarande a mu aŋ wop hɛ asum-e?
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Aŋyathki ŋa ɔnȧntȧ aŋ gbǝli saŋ amɔl ma ɔnȧntȧ ɔ yi ras yi ŋaŋ-i? Kɛrɛ mȧrey mǝ tǝ der ma mǝ a nɔy ŋa ɔnȧntȧ, ɔwa ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati aŋ tǝ wop asum.

kɛrɛ kɔnɛ nu gbo ka talɔmɛ tǝsɔkar ta ȧŋseth ŋa aŋIsrɛl.
Ɔwa ma nǝ kɔnɛ-e, tam nu, nǝ pa, Rȧbȧy ra ro riyana rǝ po fat.
Yenkǝs nu aŋtuy, fethǝr nu aŋa ba arom-e, yokas nu aŋfi-e, wurɔ nu aŋkǝrǝfi. Naŋ nǝ po sɔthɔ rǝ kǝte ram, ɔwa sɔŋ nu rǝ kǝte gbasi ȧrȧm.
Te nu keranɛ abɔŋɔ, akala ȧferȧ, thalɔm akɛm ka ɛbuthu ɛ nu.
Te nu keranɛ ɛgbaŋfa ka ȧŋbiyas, te nu keranɛ suma tǝrǝŋ, te nu keranɛ ɛkɔftha thalɔm tǝtǝk, kotȧy-e wuni yɔ mǝpanth ɔ mar sɔthɔ ɛyɛt yɔŋ ɛdi.
Rǝ kǝpet o kǝpet thalɔm tǝgbɔm o tǝgbɔm mȧ nǝ wɔŋ-e, thɛns ri nu wuni finɔ; ɔwa rǝ mǝ nǝ yianɛ haŋ nǝ wur ri.
Ma nǝ wɔŋ rǝ aseth-e, kori ŋi.
Bepi ȧŋseth aŋ yi afinɔ-e, yɔ mathɔfǝl ma nu mǝ rensa ŋi, kɛrɛ bepi aŋ yi hɛ afinɔ-e, yɔ mathɔfǝl ma nu mǝ kȧl ro nu.
Ɔwa wuni o wuni ɔwe te malanɛ nu, ɔwa ɔ te tǝl ȧsim ta nu-e, ma nǝ wur ka ȧŋseth ŋati-e, thalɔm ka kȧpet kati-e, koŋkoŋ kabof ka ȧtȧtək ta nu.
Tɛntɛnɛ i kanɛ nu, pǝ tǝ yi ɔfisa ta ȧŋthɔf ŋa ro Sɔdɔm yi ro Kɔmɔra ka ȧŋrey ŋa kagbǝk ɛpa, pǝthasi ta kȧpet kati.
Kǝla, i som nu mɔ tǝlɔmɛ kǝtɔŋ ka tȧthɔlu. Tiyȧŋ, yi nu na atempi yereŋ mɔ ɛbok, ɔwa yi nu na athɔfǝl bɛm mɔ tǝpǝrǝm.
Kɛrɛ pɛndaf nu afǝm, ȧtesoma-e aŋ tǝ lȧnki nu ka aŋgbǝka, ɔwa aŋ tǝ sapa nu nǝkɛt ka ɛseth yaŋ ɛgbanɛ.
Aŋ tǝ kera nu sɔ rodi ka aŋbȧy yi aŋbȧki salata mi, kȧmȧ nǝ yi mǝseri ro ŋaŋ yi ka tȧbona tǝlɔm.
Kɛrɛ ma a lȧnki nu-e, te nu soli ta ȧte mǝ nǝ fɔf, kotȧy-e ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati a tǝ sɔŋ nu ȧte mǝ nǝ fɔf.
kotȧy-e naŋ tha mǝ fɔf, kɛrɛ ɔYina mǝsǝm ka ɔKas ka nu kɔnɔ mǝ fɔf rokor ka nu.
Ɔwɔnt ɔ tǝ lȧnki ɔwɔnt ka rǝfi, ɔwa ɔkas ɔ tǝ lȧnki ɔwan kɔŋ. Ɔwa awuth aŋ tǝ yokar aŋa kom ŋa kȧmȧ aŋ yɔ a dif ŋa.
Afǝm bɛ aŋ tǝ gbɛŋa nu salata ȧŋes a mi, kɛrɛ ɔwe mǝ muyu haŋ ka ɔthalnɛ-e, kɔnɔ kati ɔ tǝ kisi.
Bepi a sompa nu ka kȧpet ake-e, gbukɛ nu nǝ kɔ ka kȧlɔm. Tǝ tɛntɛnɛ i kanɛ nu, nǝ gbǝli hɛ po kori tapet ta aŋIsrɛl bɛ haŋ ɔWan ka wuni ɔ po der.
Ukarande ɔ thas hɛ ɔkarmɔkɔ kɔŋ, thalɔm ȧbɔy ɔ thas hɛ ɔmarki kɔŋ.

Ɔbeki ta ɔkarande tǝ kǝyi mɔ ɔkarmɔkɔ kɔŋ, dɛ yi ȧŋbɔy mɔ ɔmarki kɔŋ. Bepi a po bont ɔmarki kɔŋ, dɛ yi ȧŋbɔy mɔ ɔmarki kɔŋ. Bepi a po bont ɔmarki ka ȧŋseth Biyɛlsibɔb-e, pǝ tha gbethi ŋaŋ aŋa yi ka kabɔr kɔŋ.
Tiyȧŋ te nu nesa ŋa, kotȧy-e tȧy tǝgbǝpǝr tǝ yi hɛ ȧte mǝ a te ba kǝgbǝpǝri; ɔwa tȧy tǝmaŋknɛ tǝ yi hɛ ȧte mǝ a te ba kǝŋaibi.
Ȧtȧ i kanɛ nu ka ɔbi-e, pa ti nu ka ɔwaŋ. Ɔwa ȧte nǝ tǝl ro lǝns-e, tam ti nu ka ɛseth rokɔm.
Te nesa aŋa mǝ dif aŋdɛr, kɛrɛ aŋ gbǝli hɛ dif aŋesǝm. Kɛrɛ nesa nu kɔn ɔwe gbǝli dim aŋesǝm dɛ yi aŋdɛr ro yahanama.
A thila hɛ ɛgbaŋa ŋarǝŋ ta apɛni-i? Ɔwa hali ukin ka ŋaŋ ɔ fumpɔ hɛ ro thɔf thambe ɔKas ka nu ɔ tȧrȧ ti.
Ɔwa hali aŋfon ŋa tabomp ta nu-e, a po lɔm ŋa bɛ.
Tiyȧŋ te nu nesa, nǝ ba mɔlɔ pǝthasi ɛgbaŋa agbȧthi.
Wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ seri ta ȧta mi rodi ka aŋfǝm, minɛ sɔ i ti seri ta atɔŋ rodi ka ɔKas kȧmi ɔwe yi ro riyana.
Kɛrɛ wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ pɛnsanɛ mi rodi ka aŋfǝm-e, minɛ sɔ i ti pɛnsanɛ kɔ rodi ka ɔKas kȧmi ɔwe yi ro riyana.
Te nanɛ kǝpa i der tǝ kǝsɔŋ mǝthɔfǝl ka ȧdȧru. I der hɛ tǝ kǝsɔŋ mǝthɔfǝl, kɛrɛ i karanɛ agbathɔ.
kotȧy-e i der tǝ kǝbot mǝputhanɛ kǝtɔŋ ka ɔwan uruni yi ɔkas kɔŋ, kǝtɔŋ ka ɔwan ubɛra yi ɔkara kɔŋ, dɛ yi kǝtɔŋ ka ɔwe balȧ ka ɔwan kɔŋ uruni yi ɔniŋkara kɔŋ.
Ɔwa aŋtheranɛ ŋa wuni aŋ tǝ yi ka rȧkomra rɔŋ gbeŋ.
Wuni o wuni ɔwe bɔthǝr ɔkas thalɔm ɔkara pǝthasi minɛȧŋ, ɔ bek hɛ ta ȧtȧ mi. Ɔwa wuni o wuni ɔwe bɔthǝr ɔwan uruni thalɔm ɔwan ubɛra pǝthasi minɛȧŋ, ɔ bek hɛ ta ȧtȧ mi.
Ɔwa kɔn ɔwe te gbasi akǝnt kɔŋ kǝpǝŋkinɛ, ɔ tȧŋ mi-e, ɔ bek hɛ ta ȧtȧ mi
Ɔwe mǝ bɛnɛ aŋesǝm ŋɔŋ ɔ tǝ dim ŋi, ɔwa ɔwe mǝ dim aŋesǝm ŋɔŋ salata mi ɔ tǝ fir ŋi.
Ɔwe malanɛ nu ɔ malanɛ mi, ɔwa ɔwe malanɛ mi-e, ɔ malanɛ ɔwe som mi.
Ɔwe mǝ malanɛ unabi pǝkasifɛ ɔ yi unabi-e, ɔ tǝ sɔthɔ ȧŋrȧm ŋa unabi, ɔwa ɔwe mǝ malanɛ wuni lompi pǝkasifɛ ɔ yi wuni lompi-e, ɔ tǝ sɔthɔ ȧŋrȧm ŋa wuni lompi.
Wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ sɔŋ apɔthi ŋa mȧnt mǝtaŋk tǝ kǝmun ka ukin ka aŋlɔl aŋe pǝkasifɛ ɔ yi ukarande-e, i kanɛ nu tɛntɛnɛ ɔ ba hɛ kǝdim ȧŋrȧm ŋɔŋ.
Ka pǝ re yi ma Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ po yamari aŋkarande ŋɔŋ tɔfɔt ŋarǝŋ-e, ɔ wur ri tǝ kǝthǝksa dɛ yi tǝ kǝtam ka tapet taŋ.
Ma Yɔnȧŋ ɔ tǝl ka ȧŋseth ŋa tȧrǝŋka mȧyɔs ma Kraist-e, ɔ som akarande ŋɔŋ ŋarǝŋ.
kaŋ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Munɔ yi kɔn ɔwe ba kǝder-i, thalɔm sǝ ba tǝ kǝkǝli ta ulɔm-i?
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ lasi ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Kɔnɛ nǝ tɔri Yɔn mȧtȧy ama nǝ tǝl dɛ yi ama nǝ nənk.
Aŋfith aŋ sɔthɔ kakǝli ka ŋaŋ, aŋtǝtkɛ aŋ kɔth, aŋa ba rǝlel-e, a fethǝr ŋa, aŋtȧŋȧ aŋ tǝl, a yokas aŋfi-e, ɔwa a tɔri ȧkɛra kǝfinɔ ka Kuru ka ȧŋmɔnɛ.
Ɔwa wuni ka aruba wɔŋ ɔwe te fir tȧy tǝpǝnthbǝla ro rɔmi.
Maŋ po kɔnɛ-e, Yisɔs ɔ tǝp kǝpa ka ȧsuniya ta salata Yɔn, Ko tȧy tȧŋ nǝ kɔ ro wula tǝ kǝkǝli-e? Kǝthȧŋkɛ ȧke aŋfef aŋ yinktha-i?
Kɛrɛ ko tȧy tȧŋ nǝ wur tǝ kǝkǝli-e? Wuni ɔwe lopra ɛlopra ɛnɔfthɔ-i? Kǝla, ŋaŋ aŋa wɔŋ ɛlopra ɛnɔfthɔ aŋ yi ka ɛseth ya aŋbȧy.
Kɛrɛ kɔyɛŋ gbeŋ nǝ wur-e? Tǝ kǝnǝŋk unabi-i? Aŋko i kanɛ nu-e, uthasi unabi.
Kɔn ɔwe ta ɔwe a gbal kǝpa, Kǝla i som ɔsom kȧmi roder ka mu kǝdi, Ɔwe mǝ bɛmpa aroŋ da mu rodi kȧmu.
Tǝ tɛntɛnɛ i kanɛ nu, kǝtɔŋ ka ŋaŋ aŋa afǝm abom aŋ kom wuni ɔ tha yokanɛ hɛ ɔwe yi ubana uthasi Yɔnȧŋ ɔBaftays. Kɛrɛ ɔwe yi ɔlɔl thɔŋ bɛ ka rȧbȧy ra ro riyana ɔ yi ubana uthasi kɔ.
Kǝtǝp ka mȧrey ma Yɔn ɔBaftays haŋ ka ȧŋlɔkɔ aŋe rȧbȧy ra ro riyana rǝ tǝlnɛ afɔsɔ-e, ɔwa aŋfǝm ŋa afɔsɔ aŋ gbasi ŋi rǝ afɔsɔ.
kotȧy-e aŋnabi yi aŋthɔ aŋ nȧbi haŋ ka kȧder ka Yɔn.
Ɔwa bepi nǝ selɔ tǝ kǝmalanɛ ti-e, Ilaya kɔn ɔwe, ɔwe ba tǝ kǝder.
Ɔwe ba ɛlǝns ta ɔ tǝl.
Ko rǝka raŋ mǝ i lomɔ rȧkomra are-e? Rǝ bȧlȧnɛ mɔ afɛth aŋa yirȧ ka ɔdɛr ɔthila, aŋ muti aŋkos ŋaŋ,
kaŋ pa, Sǝ fɛŋa nu tulɛŋ, nǝ thɔmɔ hɛ; sǝ leŋa nu mǝleŋ ma rǝbora, kɛrɛ nǝ bok hɛ.
kotȧy-e Yɔnȧŋ ɔ der hɛ rǝ kǝdi thalɔm rǝ kǝmun, kaŋ pa, Ɔ ba ukǝrǝfi.
ƆWan ka wuni ɔ der rǝ kǝdi dɛ yi rǝ kǝmun, ɔwa aŋ pa, Kǝli ulaŋgba uwɔnthi rɛ umun ubana-e, uyathki ka aŋthoŋkla ɛfȧk yi aŋfǝm ŋa ɛhakɛ. Kɛrɛ kǝtemp kǝ tǝ sɔthɔ mǝmari ka mȧyɔs mati.
Ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati ɔ tǝp kǝthɛkɛ tapet ro ɔ tha po yɔ mȧyɔs mɔŋ mǝkabanɛ, pǝkasifɛ aŋ thupi hɛ, kɔ pa,
Mɔnɛ ro mu Korasin! Mɔnɛ ro mu Bɛthsayda! kotȧy-e bepi mȧyɔs mǝkabanɛ ama a po yɔ kǝtɔŋ ka nu-e, a yɔ ma naŋ ro Tair dɛ yi ro Sidon-e, aŋ tǝ po naŋ thupi ɔwoni rǝ kotha kǝnɛthɛ dɛ yi rǝ ros.
Kɛrɛ i kanɛ nu, pǝ tǝ yi ɔfisa ta ro Tair yi ro Sidon ka ȧŋrey ŋa kǝthoŋkas pǝthasi nu.
Ɔwa munɔ Kepaniyɔm, a tǝ ŋata mu ro riana-i? A tǝ thora mu ro kǝrǝfi! kotȧy-e bepi aŋ po naŋ yɔ mȧyɔs mǝkabanɛ ro Sɔdɔm ama a po yɔ ro mu-e, kǝ tǝ tǝma naŋ haŋ ka-ake.
Kɛrɛ i kanɛ nu, pǝ tǝ yi ɔfisa ta ȧŋthɔf ŋa ro Sɔdɔm ka ȧŋrey ŋa kǝthoŋkas pǝthasi munɔ.
Ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa, I mɔmɔ mu, ɔKas ɔMarki ka ro riyana yi ȧdȧru, pǝkasifɛ mǝ po maŋk mȧtȧy ame ka aŋtempi yi aŋtara tȧy, ɔwa mǝ ŋaibi ma ka tǝlɛnth.
Aŋko, ɔKas, ȧtesoma-e ya pǝ yi ɔfinɔ ka kakǝli ka mu.
ƆKas kȧmi ɔ po sɔŋ mi mətȧy bɛ, ɔwa wuni o wuni ɔ tɛ hɛ ɔWan thambe ɔKas; ɔwa wuni o wuni ɔ tɛ hɛ ɔKas thambe ɔWan dɛ yi ka ɔwe ɔWan ɔ yema tǝ kǝŋaibi kɔ.
Der nu ro rɔmi, naŋ bɛ aŋa mǝ thɔrɔ dɛ yi aŋa ba tothe tǝlel, ɔwa i ti sɔŋ nu kǝfothanɛ.
Gbasi kȧronke kȧmi nǝ rǝnȧ ki, kȧmȧ nǝ thǝkǝs ro rɔmi; kotȧy-e min thɔfǝl bɛm, i kȧl ba ȧmerȧ athoranɛ, ɔwa nǝ tǝ fir kǝfothanɛ ka ɛŋesǝm ɛ nu.
kotȧy-e kȧronke kȧmi kǝ tui hɛ tȧy, ɔwa akothe kȧmi kǝ fǝŋf.
Ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ gbǝkinɛ atɔr ka aŋsabath. Ɔwa ma aŋkarande ŋɔŋ aŋ yi ador-e, aŋ tǝp kǝsimǝth magbas, kaŋ di ma.
Kɛrɛ ma aŋFarisi aŋ nənk ti-e, aŋ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Kǝli aŋkarande a mu aŋ yɔ ȧte pǝ te mar yɔ ka ȧŋrey ŋa aŋsabath.
kɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Nǝ tha karaŋ hɛ ȧte Debid ɔ yɔ ma dor rǝ bȧk kɔ dɛ yi ŋaŋ aŋa yi yi kɔn-i?
Ma ɔ wɔŋ ka ȧŋseth ŋa Kuru, kɔ di kabo kǝsǝm ȧke pǝ te mar di ta atɔŋ thalɔm ta ȧte ŋaŋ aŋa yi yi kɔnɔ, thambe gbo ta aŋfode-i?
Thalɔm nǝ tha karaŋ hɛ ka aŋthɔ kǝpa ka aŋsabath aŋfode ŋa ȧŋseth ŋa Kuru aŋ lǝsǝr aŋsabath, kɛrɛ aŋ ba hɛ mǝthɛkɛ-i?
Kɛrɛ i kanɛ nu kǝpa, ukin ɔwe yi ubana pǝthasi ȧŋseth ŋa Kuru ɔ yi nɔ.
Ɔwa bepi nǝ tȧrȧ naŋ aŋlokthi ŋa ȧsim ȧte, I fela ȧney, pǝ yi hɛ sathka, nǝ gbǝli hɛ naŋ sɔŋ mǝtheri ka ŋaŋ aŋa yi apaŋi tȧy.
kotȧy-e ɔWan ka wuni ɔ yi ɔMarki ka aŋsabath.
Ma ɔ wur ri-e, ɔ kɔnɛ ka ȧŋseth ŋaŋ agbanɛ.
Ka wuni ɔ yi ri ɔwe ba kǝta kǝfi. Kaŋ yif kɔ, aŋ pa, Pǝ yi ɔlompi tǝ kǝyeŋkǝs wuni ka ȧŋrey ŋa ȧŋsabath-i? (kȧmȧ aŋ ba tȧy tǝ kǝgbanthir kɔ).
kɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Wuni reke kǝtɔŋ ka nu ɔwe mǝ ba kǝlɔmɛ kin, bepi ɔ fumpɔ rǝ abi ka aŋsabath-e, mǝ ɔ te wop kɔ tǝ kǝwura kɔ-e?
Thamsinɛ wuni kǝpet ɔ ba amɔlɔ pǝthasi kǝlɔmɛ! Tiyȧŋ pǝ yi ɔlompi tǝ kǝyɔ tȧy tǝfinɔ ka ȧŋrey ŋa aŋsabath.
kɔ pa ka ɔlaŋgba, Thanthi kȧta ka mu. Kɔ thanthi ki, ka kǝ kȧl yeŋk mɔ kalɔm.
Ka aŋFarisi aŋ wur, aŋ nǝŋkanɛ ta atɔŋ, to mǝ aŋ yɔ tǝ kǝdif kɔ.
Yisɔsȧŋ ma ɔ tȧrȧ ti-e, ɔ wur ri, ka agbȧthi aŋ tȧŋ kɔ, kɔ yeŋkǝs ŋa bɛ.
Kɛrɛ ɔ maŋ ŋa kȧmȧ aŋ te yɔ a tȧrȧ kɔ,
kȧmȧ ȧte Isaya ɔnȧbi ɔ pa tǝ lasǝr, kǝpa,
Kǝla, ȧŋbɔy a mi ɔwe i po thith, Ɔbɔthǝr kȧmi ka ɔwe ȧŋmerȧ a mi aŋ ba mǝbɔnɛ. I ti bot ɔYina kȧmi ro ŋɔŋ, Ɔwa ɔ tǝ tɔri mǝlompi ka tȧbona tǝlɔm.
Ɔ ba hɛ kǝgbȧl, thalɔm kǝŋȧtȧ ȧrim rɔŋ, Ɔwa wuni o wuni ɔ ba hɛ kǝtǝl ȧrim rɔŋ ka asoŋ tǝbana.
Ɔ ba hɛ kǝsim kǝthȧnkɛ kǝnulȧ, Ɔ ba hɛ kǝdimsi awik aŋa mǝ wur kimȧ, Haŋ ɔ somrȧ kǝthoŋkas tǝ kǝtham.
Ɔwa ka ȧŋes ŋɔŋ tȧbona tǝlɔm tǝ tǝ gbak ȧmerȧ.
kaŋ kȧrȧ wuni ɔwe ba ukǝrǝfi ro ŋɔŋ, ɔ yi ufith dɛ yi kǝbobo. Kɔ yeŋkǝs kɔ, ɔwa ɔlaŋgba kǝbobo ɔ nənk, ɔ kȧl fɔf.
Ka ȧsuniya bɛ aŋ kabanɛ, aŋ pa, ƆWan ka Debid, kɔn tha ɔwe-i?
Kɛrɛ ma aŋFarisi aŋ tǝl ti-e, aŋ pa, Ɔwuni ɔwe ɔ wurɔ akǝrǝfi ka aŋfɔsɔ ŋa Biyɛlsibɔb, ɔbȧy ka aŋkǝrǝfi.
Ma Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ tȧrȧ ɛnanɛ yaŋ-e, ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Rǝbai o rǝbai ro mǝputhanɛ mǝ wɔŋ rǝ tǝ sakthɛ; ɔwa kǝpet o kǝpet thalɔm aseth o seth ro mǝputhanɛ mǝ yi aŋ gbǝli hɛ tǝma.
Bepi Sethani ɔ wurɔ Sethani-e, ɔ timnɛ, ɔwa to rȧbȧy rɔŋ mǝ rǝ gbǝli tǝma-e?
Bepi i wurɔ akǝrǝfi ka aŋfɔsɔ ŋa Biyɛlsibɔbȧŋ, rǝ kȧta ka kanɛ aŋwuth a nu mǝ aŋ wurɔ ŋa-e? Tiyȧŋ ŋa mǝ gbǝka nu ȧŋpa.
Kɛrɛ bepi i wurɔ akǝrǝfi ka aŋfɔsɔ ŋa ɔYina ka Kuru Mǝsaba-e, rȧbȧy ra Kuru rǝ derǝr nu.
Thalɔm to wuni mǝ ɔ gbǝli wɔŋ rǝ ȧŋseth ŋa wuni ba afɔsɔ tǝ kǝlukǝs ɛyɛt yɔŋ thambe ɔ mɔtha sek ɔwuni kati-e? Kǝdarǝŋ kati ɔ tǝ gbǝli tɛn lukǝs ɛyɛt ya ȧŋseth ŋɔŋ.
Ɔwe te yi ka ȧŋgbȧp a mi ɔ tǝma kǝŋamnɛ mi. Ɔwe te thoŋkla dɛ yi minɛȧŋ, ɔ sakthi.
Tiyȧŋ i kanɛ nu, ɛhakɛ bɛ-e, dɛ yi ȧsim tǝlǝs bɛ ȧte afǝm mǝ aŋ fɔf kǝŋamnɛ Kuruȧŋ, a tǝ tera ŋa ti, kɛrɛ a ba hɛ kǝtera ɔwuni ɔwe mǝ fɔf kǝŋamnɛ ɔYina mǝsǝm.
Wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ fɔf ɔlǝs ta ɔWan ka wuni, a tǝ tera kɔ ti; kɛrɛ ɔwe mǝ fɔf ɔlǝs ta ɔYina mǝsǝm, a ba hɛ kǝtera kɔ ti hali ka ȧdȧru are, ta a pa ras ka ȧdȧru ara mǝ derȧŋ.
Yɔ hɔ kȧmȧ aŋǝnt aŋ thesa, yi mȧkomi mati mǝ thesa, thalɔm yɔ aŋǝnt aŋ lǝsǝ yi mȧkomi mati mǝ lǝsǝ; kotȧy-e a tȧrȧ aŋǝnt ka mȧkomi mati.
Naŋ rǝkomra ra ɛgbɔrɔ, to mǝ nǝ gbǝli fɔf mətȧy mǝfinɔ ma nǝ yi alǝs-e? kotȧy-e kasǝŋ kǝ tǝ fɔf kǝwur ka kala ka ȧŋmerȧ.
Ɔwuni finɔ ɔ wurɔ mətȧy mǝfinɔ ka ɛbɛnɛnɛ yɔŋ ɛfinɔ, ɔwa ɔwuni lǝs ɔ wurɔ mətȧy mǝlɔs ka ɛbɛnɛnɛ yɔŋ ɛlǝs.
Kɛrɛ i kanɛ nu kǝpa-e, rim o rim rǝyai ara afǝm mǝ aŋ fɔf aŋ ba tǝ kǝgbaki ti ka ȧŋrey ŋa kǝthoŋkas.
kotȧy-e ka ȧsim ta mu rǝ mǝ a sɔŋ mu mǝmari, ɔwa ka ȧsim ta mu rǝ mǝ a sɔŋ mu mǝtheri.
Ka aŋkarmɔkɔ dɛ yi aŋFarisi alɔm aŋ pa, Karmɔkɔ, sǝ yema nənk amisali ka kȧta ka mu.
Kɛrɛ ɔ wosa ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Rǝkomra rǝlǝs, rǝte lanɛ rǝ thɛns amisali, kɛrɛ a sɔŋ hɛ ŋa amisali, thambe ȧŋmisali ŋa ɔnȧbi Yona.
kotȧy-e mɔ mǝ Yonaȧŋ ɔ ba mǝrei mǝsas pali gbɛs ka akor ka kalop kǝbana-e, ya ɔWan ka wuni mǝ ɔ yi rokor ka ȧŋthɔf mǝrei mǝsas pali gbɛsȧŋ.
Aŋfǝm ŋa ro Ninifɛ aŋ tǝ tǝma yi rȧkomra are ka kathoŋkas-e, aŋ tǝ sɔŋ ri mǝtheri, kotȧy-e aŋ thupi ka kakawandi ka Yona, ɔwe yi ubana uthasi Yonaȧŋ ɔ yi nɔ.
Ɔbȧy ubɛra ka ȧŋthɔf ȧdiyɔ ɔ tǝ yokanɛ yi rȧkomra are ka kathoŋkas-e, ɔ tǝ sɔŋ ri mǝtheri, kotȧy-e ɔ wur ɔbɔli tǝ kǝtǝl kȧtemp ka Sɔlɔmɔn, ɔwe yi ubana uthasi Sɔlɔmɔn ɔ yi nɔ.
Ma ɔkǝrǝfi ulǝs ɔ wur ka wuni-e, ɔ yanta yanta dɛr ro mȧnt mǝ te yi, ɔ thɛns kǝfothanɛ kɛrɛ ɔ fir hɛ ki.
Ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati ɔ tǝ pa, I ti kȧlanɛ ka ȧŋseth a mi ro i wur. Ma ɔ bek ri-e, ɔ fir ŋi afoth, agbǝl, ɔwa ayesi.
Ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati ɔ kɔnɛ, ɔ karanɛ akǝrǝfi tamthǝdɛrǝŋ alɔm aŋa yi alǝs athasi kɔ, kaŋ wɔŋ aŋ yirȧ ri. Ɔwa mȧlǝpsɔ ma ɔwuni kati mǝ yi mǝlǝs mǝthasi matɔtɔkɔ. Ya pǝ yi sɔ yi rȧkomra rǝlǝs are.
Ma ɔ bɔ fɔfȧnɛ aŋfǝm-e, ɔkara kɔŋ yi aŋwɔnt ŋɔŋ aŋ tǝma rokaŋ, aŋ yema kǝ fɔfȧnɛ kɔ.
Ka ukin ɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Ɔya ka mu yi aŋwɔnt mu aŋ tǝma rokaŋ, aŋ yema kǝfɔfanɛ mu.
Kɛrɛ ɔ lasi, ɔ pa ka ɔwe kanɛ kɔ-e, Kanɛ yi ɔkara ka mi-e, ɔwa kanɛ ŋaŋ yi aŋwɔnt a mi-e?
kɔ thanthi kȧta kɔŋ, ɔ lomanɛ ki ka aŋkarande ŋɔŋ, kɔ pa, Kǝli ɔkara kȧmi dɛ yi aŋwɔnt a mi!
Ȧtesoma-e wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ yɔ mȧselɔ ma ɔKas kȧmi ɔwe yi ro riana-e, kɔnɔ yi ɔwɔnt mi uruni yi ɔwɔnt mi ubɛra dɛ yi ɔkara kȧmi.
Ka ȧŋrey ŋati Yisɔs ɔ wur ka ȧŋseth, ɔ kɔ yirȧ ro baŋ rayɛr.
Ka suniya tǝbana tǝ thoŋklanɛ ro ŋɔŋ, haŋ ɔ wɔŋ ka abil, ɔ yirȧ. Ka ȧruniya bɛ rǝ tǝma ro gbaŋ.
kɔ fɔfȧnɛ ŋa mətȧy mǝgbathi rǝ ɛlomɔ, ɔ pa, Kǝla, usak ɔ wur tǝ kǝsak.
Ma ɔ sak-e, mater mǝlɔm mǝ fumpɔ ro roŋ dayɛr, ka ɛbȧmp aŋ der aŋ gbȧmǝs ma.
Mǝlɔm mǝ fumpɔ rǝ agbalaŋ, ro mǝ te ba ɛthɔf ɛgbathi. Ɔlɛmp gbo mǝ lɔkɔ-e, ȧtesoma-e mǝ ba hɛ ɛthɔf ɛbɔlɔŋ.
Ɔwa ma aret rǝ gbep-e, ȧney nǝ gbaŋar ma, mǝ wela pǝkasifɛ mǝ ba hɛ ɛthǝnk.
Mǝlɔm mǝ fumpɔ ka tȧbȧnk ratɔŋ, ka tȧbȧnk tǝ lɔkɔ, tǝ thiŋkanɛ ma.
Kɛrɛ mǝlɔm mǝ fumpɔ ka ȧŋthɔf afinɔ, ka mǝ kom mǝkomi, mǝlɔm mɔlɔ ma kɛmɛ kin, mǝlɔm tǝgba tǝsas, mǝlɔm kǝgba tɔfɔt.
Ɔwe ba ɛlǝns ta ɔ tǝl.
Ka aŋkarande aŋ der aŋ pa ro ŋɔŋ, To pǝ som mǝ fɔfȧnɛ ŋa rǝ ɛlomɔ-e?
kɔ lasi ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Ro rɔnu a sɔŋ kȧtȧrȧ ka ɛgbundu ya rȧbȧy ra ro riyana, kɛrɛ ro rɔŋaŋ a sɔŋ hɛ ki.
kotȧy-e wuni o wuni ɔwe ba, kɔnɔ mǝ a sɔŋ, ɔ tǝ ba agbȧthi, kɛrɛ wuni o wuni ɔwe te ba, a tǝ nɔy kɔ hali ara ɔ ba.
Tȧsom i fɔfȧnɛ ŋa rǝ ɛlomɔ, pǝkasifɛ hali aŋ kǝli aŋ nənk hɛ, ɔwa hali aŋ su ɛlǝns aŋ tǝl hɛ, ɔwa pǝ sɔk hɛ ŋa.
A lasǝr tapa ta Isaya ro rɔŋaŋ, ȧte pa ye, Rǝ kǝsu ɛlǝns nǝ tǝ tǝl, kɛrɛ pǝ gbǝli hɛ sɔk nu, Rǝ kǝkǝli nǝ tǝ nənk, kɛrɛ nǝ gbǝli hɛ gbɛnthas ti.

kotȧy-e ɛmerȧ ya aŋfǝm aŋe ɛ gbolŋanɛ, Ɔwa ɛlǝns yaŋ ɛ tui tǝl, Ɔwa aŋ po mɔp ɛfɔr yaŋ, Ta thani aŋ ti nənk yi ɛfɔr yaŋ, Ɔwa aŋ tǝl yi ɛlǝns yaŋ, Pǝ tǝ kȧl sɔk ŋa rǝ ȧmerȧ, Ɔwa aŋ kȧl lafthɛ Kama, i yeŋkǝs ŋa.
Kɛrɛ ɛfɔr ɛ nu ɛ ba aruba, ȧtesoma-e ɛ nənk, dɛ yi ɛlǝns ɛ nu sɔ, ȧtesoma-e ɛ tǝl.
Tǝ tɛntɛnɛ i kanɛ nu-e, anȧbi yi afǝm alompi agbȧthi aŋ fela tǝ kǝnǝŋk mȧtȧy ama naŋ nǝ nənk kɛrɛ aŋ nənk hɛ ma: dɛ yi tǝ kǝtǝl mȧtȧy ama naŋ nǝ tǝl, kɛrɛ aŋ tǝl hɛ ma.
I ti lokthɛ nu ȧŋlomɔ ŋa ɔsak.
Bepi wuni o wuni ɔ tǝl ȧrim ra rabȧy-e, ɔwa pǝ sɔk hɛ kɔ-e, Sethani ɔ der, ɔ kathi kɔ ȧte a po sak ka ȧŋmerȧ ŋɔŋ. Ɔwe-e, kɔnɔ a sak ro roŋ dayɛr.
Kɛrɛ kɔnɔ ɔwe a sak ka aŋgbalaŋ-e, kɔnɔ yi ɔwe mǝ tǝl ȧrim yi mǝbɔnɛ, ɔwa ɔ malanɛ ri.
Kɛrɛ ma ɔ te ba athǝnk-e, ɔ tǝma gbo ta alɔkɔ agbut. Ɔwa ma mɔnɛ thalɔm asɔmpanɛ aŋ bek salata ȧrim, lɛmp ɔ tǝ pǝnthbǝla.
Ɔwa kɔnɔ ɔwe a sak ka tabaŋk ratɔŋ-e, kɔnɔ yi ɔwe mǝ tǝl ȧrim, kɛrɛ aŋsoli ŋa ȧdȧru yi matɔns ma rȧyola mǝ tɔkǝr ȧrim, ɔwa ɔ kom hɛ sɔ mǝkomi.
Kɛrɛ kɔnɔ ɔwe a sak ka ȧŋthɔf afinɔ ɔ yi kɔnɔ ɔwe mǝ tǝl ȧrim, ɔwa pǝ sɔk kɔ. Ɔ kom mǝkomi tɛntɛnɛ, kɔ kom mǝlɔm mɔlɔ ma kɛmɛ kin, mǝlɔm mɔlɔ ma tǝgba tǝsas, mǝlɔm mɔlɔ ma kǝgba tɔfɔt.
kɔ bot alomɔ alɔm rodi ka ŋaŋ, ɔ pa, Rȧbȧy ra ro riyana rǝ bȧlȧnɛ mɔ wuni ɔwe sak mǝter mǝfinɔ ka akɔr kɔŋ,
kɛrɛ ka tatak-e, ɔtheranɛ kɔŋ ɔ der ɔ sak kǝpika kǝtɔŋ apǝla, kɔ kɔnɛ.
Ɔwa ma mǝ lɔkɔ-e, mǝ wur ɛgbas-e, kapika sɔ kǝ wurnɛ.
Ka ɛbɔy ya ɔkas ka ȧŋseth aŋ der aŋ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Pa, mǝter mǝfinɔ tha mǝ sak ro kɔr kamu-i? To pǝ tǝp kǝpika kǝ yi ri-e?
kɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Utheranɛ ulɔm kɔnɔ po yɔ ȧte. Ka ɛbɔy aŋ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Mǝ yema sǝ kɔ tusi kapika-i?
Kɛrɛ ɔ pa, Sako, ta thani bepi nǝ tusi kapika-e, nǝ tǝ tusianɛ sɔ apǝla.
Ter yi yɛrǝŋȧŋ ɛ lɔkɔ dɛr ɔkin haŋ ka karɔk, ɔwa ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋa karɔk i ti pa ka aŋrɔk, Mɔtha nu thoŋkla kapika, ɔwa sekǝth ki rǝ ɛlik tǝ kǝthɔy. Kɛrɛ thoŋkla apǝla pa mi ro fuŋk.
kɔ bot sɔ alomɔ alɔm rodi ka ŋaŋ, ɔ pa, Rȧbȧy ra ro riyana rǝ bȧlȧnɛ mɔ aluka ŋa amustard aŋa wuni ɔ gbasi, ɔ tɛp ka akɔr kɔŋ.
Aŋ yi alɔl athasi maluka bɛ, kɛrɛ bepi aŋ po bȧk-e, aŋ yi ȧbana athasi ɛbuma bɛ, aŋ sǝkɛ ŋǝnt, ɔwa ɛbȧmp ya aŋfena aŋ der, kaŋ seth ka mara mati.
kɔ fɔf sɔ alomɔ alɔm ro ŋaŋ, ɔ pa, Rȧbȧy ra ro riyana rǝ bȧlȧnɛ mɔ ɛgbith ɛyɛ wuni bom ɔ gbasi ɔ maŋk rǝ rɛkɛ ra ɛthunth ɛsas, haŋ yi bɛ ɛ sǝkɛ ɛgbith.
Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ fɔf mȧtȧy ame bɛ ka ȧsuniya rǝ ɛlomɔ, ɔwa ɔ fɔfȧnɛ hɛ ŋa koko pǝthas rǝ alomɔ,
kȧmȧ ȧrim ra ɔnȧbi rǝ lasǝr ara pa, I ti fɔf rǝ ɛlomɔ, I ti thǝksa mȧtȧy ama a maŋk rǝ agbundu kǝbi ka ɔtɔpɛr wa ȧdȧru.
Ma Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ tey ȧsuniya-e, ɔ wɔŋ ro seth, ka aŋkarande ŋɔŋ aŋ der ro ŋɔŋ aŋ pa, Lokthia su aŋlomɔ ŋa kapika ro kɔr.
kɔ wosa, ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Ɔwe sak mater mǝfinɔ kɔnɔ yi ɔWan ka wuni.
Ɔwa akɔr-e, kǝ yi ȧdȧru. Mater mǝfinɔ mǝ yi aŋwuth ŋa rȧbȧy, kɛrɛ kapika kǝ yi aŋwuth ŋa ɔwuni lǝs.
Ɔtheranɛ ɔwe sak ki-e, Sethani kɔnɔȧŋ. Ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋa karɔk aŋ yi ɔthalnɛ wa ȧdȧru, ɔwa aŋrɔk, ŋa yi aŋmȧleka.
Tiyȧŋ mɔ mǝ a thoŋkla kapika, ɔwa a thɔi ki ro nant-e, ya mǝ pǝ yi ka ɔthalnɛ wa ȧdȧru.
ƆWan ka wuni ɔ ba kǝsom aŋmȧleka ŋɔŋ kȧmȧ aŋ wurɔ ka rȧbȧy rɔŋ matȧy bɛ ama sɔŋ kǝyɛthȧ, dɛ yi ŋaŋ aŋa yɔ ɔlǝs.
Ɔwa a tǝ fitha ŋa rǝ atoŋ ŋa nȧnt ro kǝkulɔ yi kȧŋȧkŋȧk ɛsek kǝ yi.
Ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati aŋlompi aŋ tǝ gbɛntha mɔ aret ka rȧbȧy ra ɔKas ka ŋaŋ. Ɔwe ba ɛlǝns ta ɔ tǝl.
Rȧbȧy ra ro riyana rǝ bȧlȧnɛ mɔ kɛŋ kǝbaki mɔlɔ ȧke a maŋk ro lal, ȧke wuni ɔ fir, ɔ kȧl maŋk ki, ɔwa ɔ kɔnɛ ɔ thila ara ɔ ba bɛ salata mabɔnɛ mati, kȧmȧ ɔ gbǝli wai aŋlal ŋati.
Ɔwa sɔ-e, rȧbȧy ra ro riyana rǝ bȧlȧnɛ mɔ wuni sǝkinɛ ɔwe thɛns mǝsar mǝbaki mɔlɔ.
Ɔwa ma ɔ po fir ȧsar ŋin abȧki mɔlɔ-e, ɔ kɔ thila ara ɔ ba bɛ-e, kȧmȧ ɔ wai ŋi.
Ɔwa rȧbȧy ra ro riyana rǝ bȧlȧnɛ sɔ mɔ kǝpɛl kǝgboya ȧke a fak ro baŋ, ɔwa kǝ gbip ɛlop agbaskɛ gbaskɛ.
Ma kǝ po la-e, a liŋ ki ro gbaŋ, kaŋ yirȧ aŋ thoŋkla aŋfinɔ rǝ tǝbǝlai, kaŋ fitha aŋlǝs.
Ya mǝ pǝ yi ka ɔthalnɛ wa ȧdȧru. Aŋmȧleka aŋ tǝ der, aŋ tǝ gbaski aŋlǝs ka aŋlompi,
aŋ tǝ fitha ŋa ka aŋtoŋ ŋa nȧnt, ro kǝkulɔ yi kȧŋȧkŋȧk ɛsek kǝ yi.
Kɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Mȧtȧy ame bɛ mǝ sɔk nu-i? Aŋ lasi, kaŋ pa, Aŋko, Pa.
Kɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Tiyȧŋ ukarmɔkɔ o karmɔkɔ ɔwe a thǝksa ta rȧbȧy ra ro riyana ɔ bȧlȧnɛ mɔ ulaŋgba ɔwe ba aseth-e, ɔwe mǝ wur ka ɔbɛnɛnɛ wɔŋ yɛt ɛfu yi yɛt ɛkur.
Ka pǝ re yi ma Yisɔs ɔ po gbanthi ɛlomɔ ɛye-e, ɔ wur ri.
Ma ɔ der ka ȧŋthɔf ŋɔŋ-e, ɔ thǝksa ŋa ka ȧŋseth ŋaŋ agbanɛ haŋ aŋ kabanɛ, aŋ pa, Reke ɔlaŋgba ɔwe ɔ sɔthɔ kȧtemp ake, dɛ yi mȧyɔs ma afɔsɔ ame-e?
Ɔwan ka ɔkamdɛr kɔn tha ɔwe-i? Ɔwa a bont hɛ ɔkara kɔŋ Meri-i? Aŋwɔnt ŋɔŋ, ŋa tha yi Yemǝs, Yosef, Saymɔn yi Yudaŋ-i?
Ɔwa aŋwɔnt ŋɔŋ abɛra ŋa bɛ aŋ yi hɛ yi saŋ-i? Reke thɔŋ ɔwuni ɔwe ɔ sɔthɔ mȧtȧy ame bɛ-e?
Ka pǝ kɛtha ŋa ta atɔŋ. Kɛrɛ Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Unabi ɔ paŋ hɛ ayiki, thambe ka ȧŋthɔf ŋɔŋ gbeŋ, ɔwa ro seth kɔŋ sɔ.
Tiyȧŋ ɔ yɔ hɛ ri mǝyɔs ma afɔsɔ mǝgbathi salata kate ka ŋaŋ lanɛ.
Ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati Herodȧŋ ɔtɛtrark ɔ tǝl tȧgbuŋ ta Yisɔs.
kɔ pa ka ɛbɔy yɔŋ, Ɔwe-e, Yɔnȧŋ ɔBaftays kɔnɔȧŋ. Ɔ po yokanɛ ka rafi, te ba ti mȧyɔs mǝkabanɛ ame mǝ tɔrinɛ ro ŋɔŋ.
Ȧtesoma-e Herodȧŋ ɔ po wop Yɔnȧŋ, ɔ sek kɔ, kɔ bot kɔ ka ȧŋseth ŋa tǝrǝŋka salata Herodias, ɔrani ka Filip ɔwɔnt kɔŋ.
Ȧtesoma-e Yɔn ɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Pǝ yi hɛ ɔlompi ta munɔ tǝ kǝba kɔ.
Ɔwa ma ɔ yema dif kɔ-e, ɔ nesa aŋfǝm, pǝkasifɛ aŋ nanɛ Yɔnȧŋ tǝ kǝyi unabi.
Kɛrɛ ka amet ma ȧŋrey aŋa a kom Hɛrɔdȧŋ-e, ɔwan ubɛra ka Hɛrɔdiyȧs ɔ thɔmɔ kǝtɔŋ ka ŋaŋ, ka pǝ bɔnɛ Hɛrɔdȧŋ.
Ta ȧŋsabu ŋati ɔ lahiri rǝ agbiŋ rokɔm tǝ kǝsɔŋ ɔbɔrkɔ koko ɔ thola.
Kɔnɔŋ, mɔ mǝ ɔya kɔŋ ɔ kanɛ kɔ-e, ɔ pa, Sɔŋ mi nɔ rǝ alɛfa rȧbomp ra Yɔn ɔBaftays.
Ka pǝ kɛtha ɔbȧy, kɛrɛ salata aŋgbiŋ ŋɔŋ-e, dɛ yi ŋaŋ aŋa yirȧ yi kɔn ka kǝdi-e, ɔ yamari tǝ kǝsɔŋ kɔ ri.
kɔ som kȧmȧ a gbetha rȧbomp ra Yɔn ka ȧŋseth ŋa tǝrǝŋka.
Ka a kȧrȧ rȧbomp rɔŋ ka alɛfa, ɔwa a sɔŋ ri ka ɔwath bɛra, kɔ kera ri ka ɔkara kɔŋ.
Ka aŋkarande ŋa Yɔn aŋ de gbasi kabel, kaŋ maŋk kɔ, kaŋ kɔ kanɛ ti ka Yisɔs.
Ma Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ tǝl ti-e, ɔ gbasi abil, kɔ kɔ rǝ dɛr ɔyeŋ. Ma aŋfǝm aŋ tǝl ti-e, aŋ tȧŋ kɔ ro gbaŋ kǝwur ka tapet.
kɔ wur ka ȧŋbil, ɔ nənk ȧruniya rǝbana, kɔ nǝŋka ŋa ȧney, ɔ damǝr aŋboma ŋaŋ.
Ɔwa ma rȧfɔy rǝ bek-e, aŋkarande ŋɔŋ aŋ der ro ŋɔŋ, aŋ pa, Ɔdɛr ɔwe ɔ yeŋ, ɔwa ȧŋlɔkɔ aŋ po thɔŋ thas. Ter aŋfǝm aŋ kɔnɛ, kȧmȧ aŋ kɔ ka tagbɔm, aŋ wayanɛ yɛt ɛdi.
Kɛrɛ Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Aŋ ba hɛ tǝ kǝkɔ, sɔŋ ŋa nu yɛt ɛdi.
kaŋ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Sǝ ba gbo anɔ tǝbo tamath dɛ yi ɛlop ŋarǝŋ.
kɔ pa, Kara yi nɔ ro rɔmi.
kɔ yamari aŋfǝm kȧmȧ aŋ yirȧ ka akereŋ, kɔ gbasi tabo tamath yi ɛlop ŋarǝŋ, ɔwa ɔ kǝli rokɔm ka ȧkȧriyana, ɔ ruba yi, kɔ simǝth tabo, ɔ sɔŋ ti aŋkarande ŋɔŋ, ka aŋkarande aŋ sɔŋ aŋfǝm.
Ka ŋa bɛ aŋ di, aŋ namra. Kaŋ gbas ɛbɛm ɛtianɛ aŋ lasǝr tǝbǝlai tɔfɔt tǝrǝŋ.
Ɔwa ŋaŋ aŋa di-e, aŋ yi mɔlɔ ma afǝm aruni ɛwul tamath kǝte lɔmanɛ bom-ŋaŋ dɛ yi afɛth.
Ka ɔlɛmp wati Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ tɔri aŋkarande ŋɔŋ tǝ kǝbaka ka ȧŋbil kȧmȧ aŋ tǝma kɔ kǝdi romɔri, haŋ ɔ po ter aŋfǝm aŋ kɔnɛ.
Ma ɔ po ter aŋfǝm-e, ɔ gbep ka kateŋ, kɔn son tǝ kǝramnɛ. Ɔwa ma rȧfɔy rǝ bek-e, ɔ yirȧ ri kɔn son.
Kɛrɛ ȧŋbil aŋ yi thɔŋ ro baŋ ratɔŋ, ka ɛmuŋkǝl ɛ sɔmpa ŋi, kotȧy-e aŋfef aŋ wurǝr ŋa rodi.
Ma pǝ yema sɔk-e, Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ der ro ŋaŋ, ɔ kɔth ka kȧbȧŋ rokɔm.
Ma aŋkarande aŋ nənk kɔ mɔ mǝ ɔ kɔth ka kȧbȧŋ rokɔm-e, aŋ nesa, kaŋ pa, Ayina ŋaŋ. Kaŋ sel ɛrɔŋ yi rǝnes.
Ka ɔlɛmp wati Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Bȧk nu tǝbuth; minɛȧŋ. Te nu nesa.
Ka Pitarȧŋ ɔ pa, Pa, bepi munɔȧŋ-e, yamari mi i der ro rɔmu ka ȧmȧnt rokɔm.
kɔ pa, Der. Ka Pitarȧŋ ɔ wur ro bil, ɔ kɔth ka ȧmȧnt rokɔm tǝ kǝder ka Yisɔs.
Kɛrɛ ma ɔ nənk aŋfef abȧki-e, ɔ nesa. Ɔ tǝp kǝmɔta, kɔ sel ɛrɔŋ ɔ pa, Pa, kisis mi.
Ka ɔlɛmp wati Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ thanthi kȧta kɔŋ, ɔ wop kɔ, ɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Munɔ, mun ba kǝlanɛ kǝthan, kɔyɛŋ mǝ sikɛ-e?
Ɔwa maŋ po wɔŋ ka ȧŋbil-e, aŋfef aŋ thɔfɔla.
Ka ŋaŋ aŋa yi ro bil aŋ bȧtho kɔ, aŋ pa, Tɛntɛnɛ munɔ yi ɔWan ka Kuru.
Maŋ po fǝsi romɔri-e, aŋ bek ka aŋgbaŋ ŋa ro Kɛnɛsarɛt.
Ma aŋfǝm ŋa ɔdɛr wati aŋ tȧrȧ kɔ-e, aŋ som ka ȧŋthɔf ŋati bɛ, aŋ kȧrȧ ro ŋɔŋ aŋfǝm bɛ aŋa yi atuy.
kaŋ nɛmthɛnɛ kɔ kȧmȧ aŋ gboŋ hali gbo amɛsɛ ma aruma rɔŋ. Ɔwa ŋaŋ bɛ aŋa gboŋ kɔ-e, aŋ sɔthɔ kǝyeŋk mǝdɛr.
Ka aŋFarisi yi aŋkarmɔkɔ kǝwur ro Yerusalem aŋ der ka Yisɔs, aŋ pa,
kɔyɛŋ aŋkarande a mu aŋ lǝsǝr makur ma aŋbȧki ma aŋ te yanɛ yeŋka aŋ di-e?
kɔ lasi ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, kɔyɛŋ naŋ sɔ nǝ lǝsǝr aŋyamari ŋa Kuru salata makur ma nu-e?
kotȧy-e Kuruȧŋ ɔ pa, Yikis ɔkas ka mu yi ɔkara ka mu, dɛ yi; Kɔn ɔwe mǝ fɔf ɔlǝs ta ɔkas thalɔm ta ɔkara-e, ta ɔ fi rafi.
Kɛrɛ naŋ nǝ pa, Wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ pa ka ɔkas kɔŋ thalɔm ɔkara kɔŋ, Arǝka ra mi ara gbǝli naŋ munafas mu-e, a sɔŋ ri Kuru-e,
ɔ ba hɛ sɔ tǝ kǝyikis ɔkas kɔŋ thalɔm ɔkara kɔŋ. Ɔwa nǝ po wop ȧrim ra Kuru ɔyai salata makur ma nu.
Na amunafaki, pǝ yi ɔlompi ȧte ɔnȧbi Isaya ɔ nȧbi ta ȧtȧ nu ma ɔ pa,
Aŋfǝm aŋe aŋ yikis mi yi tasǝŋ taŋ, Kɛrɛ ɛmerȧ yaŋ ɛ bɔlȧnɛ mi.
Kɛrɛ aŋ bȧtho mi gbo kǝtiŋ, aŋ thǝksa ɛmaŋ ya afǝm a kǝpet mɔ mȧthǝksȧ maŋ.
Mȧ ɔ po tela aŋfǝm ro rɔŋɔŋ-e, ɔ pa, Tǝl nu, ɔwa tȧ pǝ sɔk nu.
Pǝ yi hɛ arǝka ara mǝ wɔŋ ka kasǝŋ ara mǝ nɔkɔs wuni, kɛrɛ ara mǝ wur ka kasǝŋ, rǝ mǝ nɔkɔs wuni.
Ka aŋkarande ŋɔŋ aŋ der kaŋ pa ro rɔŋɔŋ, Mǝ tȧrȧ kǝpa aŋFarisi aŋ bansȧ maŋ tǝl ȧsim ȧte-i?
Kɛrɛ ɔ lasi ɔ pa, Ŋǝnt o ŋǝnt aŋa ɔKas kȧmi ro riyana ɔ te tɛp-e, a ba kǝtusi ŋi.
Tey ŋa, aŋ yi gbo afith aŋa kɔtha aŋfith. Ɔwa bepi ufith ɔ kɔtha ufith-e, ŋa ŋarǝŋ aŋ tǝ fumpɔ ro fo.
Ka Pita ɔ pa, Lokthia su aŋlomɔ aŋe.
Ka Yisɔs ɔ pa, Naŋ sɔ nǝ tha ba hɛ kǝsɔthnɛ-i?
Nǝ tɛ hɛ kǝpa rǝka o rǝka ara mǝ wɔŋ ro sǝŋ rǝ thas rokor-i, ɔwa a lǝpsɔ fitha ri-i?
Kɛrɛ mȧtȧy ama wur ka kasǝŋ mǝ wur ka ȧŋmerȧ; ɔwa ame-e, mǝ mǝ nɔkɔs wuni.
Ȧtesoma-e ɛnanɛ ɛlǝs-o, kǝdifǝth-o, kǝrǝp-o, rǝkeiyo, mǝseri ma rǝyem-o yi kǝfɔf Kuru ɔlǝs-e, ɛ wur ka ȧŋmerȧ.
Mȧtȧy ame mǝ mǝ nɔkɔs wuni, kɛrɛ tǝ kǝdi kǝte yanɛ kǝ nɔkɔs hɛ wuni.
Ka Yisɔs ɔ wur ri, ɔ kɔ ka ɛgbap ya ro Tair yi ro Sidon.
Ɔwa wuni bom ka ro Kenan ɔ wur ka ɛgbap yati, ɔ sel ɛrɔŋ ɔ pa, Pa, munɔ ɔwan ka Debid, ba mi ȧney. Ukǝrǝfi ɔ sɔmpa ɔwan kȧmi ubɛra.
Kɛrɛ ɔ lasianɛ hɛ kɔ hali dim din. Ka aŋkarande ŋɔŋ aŋ der aŋ nɛmthɛnɛ kɔ, aŋ pa, Yɔ ɔwath ubɛra ɔ kɔnɛ, kotȧy-e ɔ bokǝr su.
Kɛrɛ ɔ pa, A som mi gbo ka talɔmɛ tǝsɔkar ta ȧŋseth ŋa Isrɛl.
Ka ɔya ɔ der ɔ sɔna kɔ tǝwu, ɔ pa, Pa, mar mi.
Ka Yisɔs ɔ pa, Pǝ mar hɛ tǝ kǝgbasi kabo ka aŋfɛth tǝ kǝfitha ki ka ɛtǝn.
Kɛrɛ ɔwath ubɛra ɔ pa sɔ, Tǝteŋ Pa, kɛrɛ hali ɛtǝn aŋ di atɔmp ȧte mǝ fumpɔ ro thɔf kǝwur ka aŋthebǝl ŋa aŋmarki ŋaŋ.
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Bithaŋ, kȧlanɛ ka mu kǝ bana. Ta pǝ yɔnɛ mu mɔ mǝ mǝ yema. Ka ɔwan kɔŋ ubɛra ɔ yeŋk ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati gbeŋ.
Ka Yisɔs ɔ wur ri, ɔ kɔ fatǝr kȧbȧŋ ka ro Kalili. Kɔ gbep ka kateŋ rokɔm, ɔ yirȧ ri.
Ka suniya tǝbana tǝ der ro ŋɔŋ tǝ banȧnɛ aŋtǝtkɛ-o, aŋfith-o, tabobo-o, aŋlopanɛ-o yi alɔm agbȧthi, ka a bot ŋa ka ȧtȧtək tɔŋ. Kɔ yeŋkǝs ŋa bɛ,
haŋ ȧruniya rǝ kabanɛ maŋ nənk tabobo aŋ fɔf, aŋlopanɛ aŋ yeŋk, aŋtǝtkɛ aŋ kɔth yi aŋfith aŋ nənk. Kaŋ yikis ɔKuru ka Isrɛl.
Ka Yisɔs ɔ tela ro ŋɔŋ aŋkarande ŋɔŋ, ɔ pa, I ba ȧney ta ȧruniya, ȧtesoma-e aŋ po yi yi minɛŋ mǝrei mǝsas, aŋ ba hɛ ra rǝdi. I yema hɛ tey ŋa ŋa ador, ta thani aŋ pika ro roŋ.
Ka aŋkarande ŋɔŋ aŋ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Reke mǝ sǝ sɔthɔ tǝbo tǝgbathi tǝbeki namsǝr ȧruniya rǝbana are ka ɔdɛr ɔyeŋ ɔwe-e?
Ka Yisɔs ɔ yif ŋa, Mɔlɔ tǝbo nǝ ba-a? kaŋ pa, Tamthǝdɛrǝŋ, dɛ yi ɛlop athȧn.
kɔ kanɛ ȧruniya tǝ kǝyira yirȧ ro thɔf.
kɔ gbasi tǝbo tamthǝdɛrǝŋ yi ɛlop-e, kɔ muti mɔmɔ, ɔ simǝth yi, kɔ sɔŋ aŋkarande ŋɔŋ kȧmȧ aŋ sɔŋ ȧruniya.
Ka ŋa bɛ aŋ di aŋ namra, ɔwa aŋ gbas tǝbǝlai tamthǝdɛrǝŋ ka ɛbɛm ɛtianɛ.
Ɔwa ŋaŋ aŋa di aŋ yi mɔlɔ ma afǝm aruni ɛwul yanlɛ, kǝte lɔmanɛ aŋfǝm abom yi aŋfɛthȧŋ.
kɔ ter ȧruniya, ɔ bȧkȧ ka ȧŋbil, kɔ der ka ȧŋgbȧp ŋa ro Makadan.
Ka aŋFarisi yi aŋSadusi aŋ der ro ŋɔŋ tǝ kǝmɛm kɔ, kaŋ yif kɔ tǝ kǝtɔri ŋa amisali kǝwur ro riyana.
Kɛrɛ Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ lasi, ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Ma rȧfɔy rǝ bek-e, nǝ pa, Kǝsalaŋ kǝ tǝ yi ȧtesoma-e ȧkuru kǝ yim.
Ɔwa, ka rabǝth nǝ pa sɔ-e, Kǝnkǝl kǝ tǝ der thonɔŋ ȧtesoma-e ȧkuru kǝ kuluŋanɛ kǝyim-o yi kǝbiȧŋ. O naŋ amunafaki, nǝ tȧrȧ tǝ kǝgbaski ȧder ra akuru-e, kɛrɛ nǝ tɛ hɛ gbaski ɛmisali ya ɛlɔkɔ.
Rǝkomra rǝlǝs rǝrǝpi rǝ thɛns ɛmisali, kɛrɛ a ba hɛ kǝsɔŋ ri amisali thambe ȧŋmisali ŋa Yona. Kɔ tey ŋa ɔ kɔnɛ.
Ma aŋkarande aŋ fǝsi romɔri-e, aŋ pǝnɛ tǝ kǝbananɛ tǝbo.
Ka Yisɔs ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Botnɛ nu, ɔwa pɛndaf nu ɛgbith ya aŋFarisi yi aŋSadusi.
kaŋ fɔfǝranɛ, aŋ pa, Sǝ karanɛ hɛ tǝbo.
Ma Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ tȧrȧ ti-e, ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, O naŋ nǝ ba kǝlanɛ kǝthan, to som mǝ nǝ fɔfǝranɛ ta ma nǝ te ba tǝbo-e?
Pǝ tha sɔk hɛ nu-i, ɔwa nǝ kala hɛ ɛmerȧ ta tabo tamath ta ɛwul tamath, yi amɔlɔ tǝbǝlai nǝ gbasi-i?
Thalɔm tabo tamthǝdɛrǝŋ ta ɛwul yanlɛ sɔ, yi amɔlɔ tǝbǝlai nǝ gbasi-i?
To som nǝ te tȧrȧ kǝpa i fɔfȧnɛ hɛ nu ta tǝbo-e? Kɛrɛ pɛndaf nu ta ɛgbith ya aŋFarisi yi aŋSadusi.
Ka pǝ sɔk ŋa kǝpa ɔ yamari hɛ ŋa tǝ kǝpɛndaf ɛgbith ya tǝbo, kɛrɛ ɔ yamari ŋa ta kathǝksa ka aŋFarisi yi aŋSadusi.
Ma Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ bek ka ȧŋgbȧp ŋa ro Sisaria Filipay-e, ɔ yif aŋkarande ŋɔŋ, ƆWan ka wuni, kanɛ aŋfǝm mǝ aŋ pa ɔ yi-e?
kaŋ pa, Alɔm aŋ pa Yɔnȧŋ ɔBaftays; alɔm Ilayaŋ, alɔm Yɛrimayaŋ, thalɔm ukin ka aŋnabi.
Ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Kɛrɛ naŋ, kanɛ nǝ pa minɛȧŋ i yi-e?
Ka Saymɔn Pitarȧŋ ɔ lasi, ɔ pa, Munɔ yi ɔKrayst, ɔWan ka ɔKuru ukǝli.
Ka Yisɔs ɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Munɔ mǝ ba aruba Saymɔn ɔwan ka Yona, pǝkasifɛ wuni kǝpet ɔ tɔri hɛ ti ro mu, kɛrɛ ɔKas kȧmi ɔwe yi ro riyana.
I kȧl sɔ pa ro rɔmu, Munɔ yi Pita, ɔwa rokɔm ka aŋgbalaŋ aŋe rǝ mǝ i tǝmǝr aŋchɔch a mi; ɔwa tadare ta ro kǝrǝfi tǝ ba hɛ kǝtham ŋi.
I ti sɔŋ mu mȧsapɔ ma rȧbȧy ra ro riyana, ɔwa koko ara mǝ sek ka ȧdȧru-e a tǝ sek ri ro riyana, dɛ yi koko ara mǝ sǝli ka ȧdȧru-e a tǝ sǝli ri ro riyana.
kɔ yamari aŋkarande ŋɔŋ kȧmȧ aŋ te tɔri wuni o wuni kǝpa kɔnɔ yi ɔKrayst.

Ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ tǝp kǝtɔri aŋkarande ŋɔŋ kǝpa ɔ ba kǝkɔ ro Yerusalɛm tǝ kǝnȧkȧsi mətȧy mǝgbȧthi ka mȧta ma aŋbȧki yi aŋfode ȧbana yi aŋkarmɔkɔ, ɔwa aŋ tǝ dif kɔ, ɔwa ka ȧŋrey aŋa bekȧ mǝsas a tǝ kȧl yokas kɔ.
Kȧ Pita ɔ kera kɔ rayɛr, kɔ ŋal kɔ, ɔ pa, Ta pǝ bɔlȧnɛ mu Pa. Ȧte tǝ ba hɛ kǝyi mu.
Kɛrɛ ɔ fǝlɛ, ɔ pa ka Pita, Tɔnɛ mi raŋ Sethani. Mǝ yi mi da rǝpǝnthbǝla ȧtesoma-e munɔ mǝ kǝli hɛ ta mȧtȧy ma Kuru, mǝ kǝli gbo ta mȧtȧy ma afǝm a kǝpet.
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa ka aŋkarande ŋɔŋ, Bepi wuni ɔ wuni ɔ yema tȧŋ mi-e, ta ɔ pɛnsanɛ, ɔ gbasi akǝnt kɔŋ kǝpǝŋkinɛ, ɔ tȧŋ mi.
kotȧy-e wuni o wuni ɔwe yema kisis aŋesǝm ŋɔŋ-e, ɔ tǝ dim ŋi; ɔwa wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ dim aŋesǝm ŋɔŋ salata mi ɔ tǝ fir ŋi.
To mǝ pǝ naŋfas wuni bepi ɔ sɔthɔ ȧdȧru bɛ, kɛrɛ ɔ dim aŋesǝm ŋɔŋ-e? Thalɔm ko wuni mǝ ɔ gbǝli sɔŋ tǝ kǝsinkar aŋesǝm ŋɔŋ-e?
kotȧy-e ɔWan ka wuni ɔ tǝ der ka aŋyiki ŋa ɔKas kɔŋ yi aŋmȧleka ŋɔŋ. Ɔwa ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati ɔ tǝ sɔŋ wuni o wuni amɔlɔ ma mȧyɔs mɔŋ mǝ yi.
Tɛntɛnɛ i kanɛ nu, alɔm aŋ tǝma nɔ aŋa te ba kǝnǝŋk rǝfi, haŋ aŋ nənk ɔWan ka wuni ɔ der ka rȧbȧy rɔŋ.
Ɔwa kǝdarǝŋ ka mǝrei tamthǝrukin-e, Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ keranɛ Pitarȧŋ, Yemǝsȧŋ yi Yɔnȧŋ ɔwɔnt kɔŋ, kɔ gbepa ŋa rǝ kǝteŋ kǝbɔli rǝkɔm, ŋa son.
Ka rabalanɛ rɔŋ rǝ lafthɛ rodi ka ŋaŋ. Ader rɔŋ rǝ gbɛntha mɔ aret, ɔwa ȧsuma tɔŋ tǝ fera mɔ ɔwaŋ.
Ɔwa kǝla, Mosisȧŋ yi Ilayaŋ aŋ tɔrinɛ ro ŋaŋ, kaŋ fɔfȧnɛ kɔ.
Ka Pitȧŋ ɔ pa, Pa, ɔfinɔ ta ȧtȧ su tǝ kǝyi nɔ. Bepi mǝ selɔ-e, i ti bɛmpa nɔ ɛgbɔm ɛsas, ŋin ta ȧtȧ mu, ŋin ta Mosis, dɛ yi ŋin ta Ilaya.
Ma ɔ yi ka kǝfɔf-e, kǝrǝnt kǝfera kǝgbɛntha kǝ derǝr ŋa; ɔwa rim rǝ wur ka karǝnt, rǝ pa, ƆWan kȧmi ubɔthǝr kɔnɔ ɔwe, ta ɔwe pǝ thesanɛ mi finɔ. Tǝla kɔ nu.
Ma aŋkarande aŋ tǝl ti-e, aŋ gbǝpsa, aŋ nesa ɔthasǝr.
Kɛrɛ Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ der ɔ gboŋ ŋa, ɔ pa, Yokanɛ nu, te nu nesa.
Maŋ ŋata ɛfɔr yaŋ-e, aŋ nənk hɛ wuni o wuni thambe Yisɔsȧŋ son.
Ɔwa mɔ mǝ aŋ thor ka kateŋ-e, Yisɔs ɔ yamari ŋa, ɔ pa, Te kanɛ wuni o wuni mȧnǝnk ama nǝ po nənk haŋ ɔWan ka wuni ɔ kȧl yokanɛ ka rafi.
Ka aŋkarande ŋɔŋ aŋ yif kɔ, aŋ pa, kɔyɛŋ aŋkarmɔkɔ aŋ pa Ilaya ɔ ba kǝmɔtha der-e?
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ lasi ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Tǝ tɛntɛnɛ Ilaya ɔ ba tǝ kǝder, ɔwa ɔ tǝ lompǝs mətȧy bɛ.
Kɛrɛ i kanɛ nu kǝpa, Ilaya ɔ po thɔŋ der, kɛrɛ aŋ tɛ hɛ kɔ, ɔwa aŋ po yɔ kɔ tȧy o tȧy ȧte aŋ yema. Ɔwa yaŋ sɔ ɔWan ka wuni ɔ tǝ nakasi ka mȧta maŋ.
Ka pǝ sɔk aŋkarande ŋɔŋ kǝpa ɔ fɔfȧnɛ ŋa ta Yɔn ɔBaftays.
Maŋ bek ka ȧruniya-e, ulaŋgba ɔ der ro ŋɔŋ, ɔ sɔna kɔ tǝwu, kɔ pa,
Pa, ba ȧney ta ɔwan kȧmi uruni, ɔ ba kǝtuk, ɔ sɔmpanɛ ɔbaŋ, kotȧy-e ɛlɔkɔ ɛgbathi ɔ fumpɔ ro nȧnt, ɔwa sɔ-e, ɛlɔkɔ ɛgbathi ɔ fumpɔ ro mȧnt.
Ka i po kȧrȧ kɔ ka aŋkarande a mu, kɛrɛ aŋ gbǝli hɛ damǝr kɔ.
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ wosa ɔ pa, O rǝkomra ara te lanɛ, rǝgbolŋanɛ, to mǝ i ba kǝwon yi naŋ-e? To mǝ i ba kǝwon tǝ kǝmuyu nu-e? Kara kɔ nɔ ro mi.
Ka Yisɔs ɔ ŋal ɔkǝrǝfi, kɔ gbapɛ kɔ, ka ɔwath ɔ sɔthɔ kǝyeŋk mǝdɛr ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati gbeŋ.
Ka aŋkarande aŋ der ka Yisɔs mǝnǝŋkanɛ, aŋ pa, kɔyɛŋ saŋ sǝ te gbǝli wurɔ kɔ-e?
kɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Salata kate lanɛ ka nu. Tɛntɛnɛ i kanɛ nu, Bepi gbo nǝ ba kǝlanɛ mɔ aluka ŋa amustard nǝ gbǝli pa ka kateŋ ake, Tɔnɛ nɔ mǝ kɔ ro, ɔwa kǝ tǝ tɔnɛ. Ɔwa koko rǝ tui hɛ nu tȧy.
Kɛrɛ awunɔŋ aŋ wur hɛ thambe rǝ kǝramnɛ yi kǝwop asum.
Ɔwa maŋ yirȧ ro Kalili-e, Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, A ba kǝlaŋkli ɔWan ka wuni ka mȧta ma aŋfǝm,
ɔwa aŋ tǝ dif kɔ, kɛrɛ ka ȧŋrey aŋa bekȧ mǝsas-e, a tǝ yokas kɔ. Ka pǝ nɔsinɛ ŋa ɔthasǝr.
Maŋ bek ro Kepaniyɔm-e, ŋaŋ aŋa thoŋkla ɛfȧk ya ȧŋseth ŋa Kuru aŋ der ka Pita, kaŋ pa, Ɔkarmɔkɔ ka mu ɔ la hɛ ram ȧdiyɔ?
kɔ pa, Aŋko. Ma ɔ wɔŋ ro seth-e yeŋka ɔ fɔf rim-e, Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa, To mǝ nanɛ-e, Saymɔn? aŋbȧy ŋa ȧdȧru-e ka kanɛ mǝ aŋ sɔthɔ ɛfȧk-e, ka aŋwuth ŋaŋ gbeŋ thalɔm ka atik-e?
Ɔwa ma ɔ pa, Ka atik, Yisɔs ɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Tiyȧŋ aŋwuth aŋ ba hɛ kǝsɔŋ.
Kɛrɛ kȧmȧ sǝ te yɔ ŋa aŋ pǝnthbǝla-e, kɔnɛ ro baŋ mǝ fitha anǝmp, liŋ kalop ɔwe mɔtha der. Ma mǝ po kanthi kasǝŋ kɔŋ-e mǝ tǝ fir ri akala. Gbasi ŋi ɔwa sɔŋ ŋa ta ȧtȧ mi yi ta ȧtȧ mu.
Ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati aŋkarande aŋ der ka Yisɔs, ka aŋ pa, Kanɛ mǝ tha yi ubana bɛ ka rȧbȧy ra ro riana-e?
kɔ tela uwath ulɔl ro ŋɔŋ, ɔ tǝmǝr kɔ kǝtɔŋ ka ŋaŋ,
kɔ pa, Tɛntɛnɛ i kanɛ nu, Thambe nǝ lȧfthi ɛmerȧ ɛ nu-e, nǝ sǝkɛ mɔ afɛth alɔl-e, nǝ gbǝli hɛ wɔŋ ka rȧbȧy ra ro riyana.
Tiyȧŋ wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ sanɛ mɔ ɔwath ulɔl ɔwe-e, kɔnɔ tha yi ubana ka rȧbȧy ra ro riyana.
Ɔwa bepi wuni o wuni ɔ malanɛ uwath ulɔl ukin uwunɔŋ ka ȧŋes a mi-e, minɛ ɔ malanɛ.
Kɛrɛ bepi wuni o wuni ɔ yɔ ukin ka aŋlɔl aŋe aŋa lanɛ mi ɔ pǝnthbǝla-e, pǝ tǝ yi kɔ fisa bepi a gbak kɔ ȧsar ȧgbɔlȧ ȧbana ka kalim kɔŋ, a mɔtas kɔ ka ɔbɔlɔŋ wa kȧbȧŋ.
Mɔnɛ ka ȧdȧru ta mətȧy mǝpǝnthbǝla, kotȧy-e mȧtȧy mati mǝ ba kǝder; kɛrɛ mɔnɛ ka ɔwuni kati ɔwe mǝ kȧrȧ ma!

Tiyȧŋ bepi kȧta ka mu thalɔm akatǝk ka mu kǝ yɔ mu mǝ pǝnthbǝla-e, gbǝk ki, mǝ fitha ki kȧmȧ kǝ bɔlȧnɛ mu. Pǝ tǝ yi mu fisa bepi mǝ wɔŋ ka aŋesǝm mun lopȧnɛ thalɔm mun tǝtkɛ pǝthasi kǝba mǝta mȧrǝŋ thalɔm tatǝk tǝrǝŋ, ɔwa a fitha mu ka anant nǝthǝbana.

Ɔwa bepi rȧfɔr ra mu rǝ yɔ mu mǝ pǝnthbǝla-e, kothi ri, mǝ fitha ri kȧmȧ rǝ bɔlȧnɛ mu. Pǝ tǝ yi mu fisa bepi mǝ wɔŋ ka aŋesǝm yi rǝfɔr rin-e, pǝthasi kǝba ɛfɔr yɛrǝŋ ɔwa a fitha mu ka anant na ro yahanama.
Botnɛ nu kȧmȧ nǝ te sai ukin ka aŋlɔl aŋe, kotȧy-e, i kanɛ nu kǝpa ro riyana aŋmȧleka ŋaŋ aŋ kǝli lɔkɔ o lɔkɔ ȧder ra ɔKas kȧmi ɔwe yi ro riyana.
Ȧtesoma-e ɔWan ka wuni ɔ der tǝ kǝkisis aŋa po dinɛ.
To nǝ nanɛ-e? Bepi wuni ɔ ba tǝlɔmɛ kɛmɛ kin, ɔwa ukin ka ŋaŋ ɔ sɔkar-e, ɔ tey hɛ antǝgba tanlɛ tɔfɔt tamthǝrɛŋanlɛ, ɔ kɔnɛ ka tȧteŋ tǝ kǝthɛns ɔwe sɔkar-i?
Ɔwa bepi pǝ yi ɔ fir kɔ-e, i kanɛ nu tɛntɛnɛ ɔ tǝ selǝr kɔ mǝbɔnɛ pǝthasi ta antǝgba tanlɛ tɔfɔt tamthǝrɛŋanlɛ aŋa te sɔkar.
Ya pǝ yi sɔ-e, pǝ yi hɛ mȧselɔ ma ɔKas ka nu ɔwe yi ro riyana kȧmȧ ukin ka aŋlɔl aŋe ɔ dinɛ.
Ɔwa bepi ɔwɔnt mu ɔ yɔ mu ɔlǝs-e, kɔ tɔri kɔ ɔlǝs wɔŋ na ŋarǝŋ son; bepi ɔ sua mu ɛlǝns-e, mǝ po sɔthɔ ɔwɔnt mu,
kɛrɛ bepi ɔ sua hɛ mu ɛlǝns-e, banȧnɛ wuni kin thalɔm ŋarǝŋ kȧmȧ ka tasǝŋ ta mǝseri ŋarǝŋ thalɔm asas-e, rim o rim rǝ tǝma.
Ɔwa bepi ɔ kasi kǝsuwa ŋa ɛlǝns-e, kanɛ ti ka aŋchɔch. Bepi ɔ selɔ hɛ sua ɛlǝns ka aŋchɔch-e, ta ɔ yi ro mu mɔ wuni tel dɛ yi ugbasi ɛfȧk.
Tǝ tɛntɛnɛ i kanɛ nu, rǝka o rǝka ara mǝ nǝ sek nɔru rǝ tǝ yi rǝsek ro riyana, ɔwa rǝka o rǝka ara mǝ nǝ sǝli ka ȧdȧru-e rǝ tǝ yi rǝsǝli ro riyana.
I kanɛ nu sɔ, bepi ŋarǝŋ kǝtɔŋ ka nu aŋ ba dim din ka ȧdȧru ta tȧy o tȧy ȧtȧ mǝ nǝ yif-e, ɔKas kȧmi ɔwe yi ro riyana ɔ tǝ yɔna nu ti.
kotȧy-e, ro ŋarǝŋ thalɔm asas-e mǝ aŋ gbanɛ dɛr rɔkin ka ȧŋes a mi-e, rǝ i yi kǝtɔŋ ka ŋaŋ.
Ka Pitarȧŋ ɔ der ɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Mariki, amɔlɔ ɔwɔnt mi mǝ ɔ yɔ mi ɔlǝs, ɔwa i tera kɔ-a? Haŋ kǝtǝma tamthǝdɛrǝŋ-a?
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ wosa ɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, I pa hɛ ro mu haŋ tamthǝdɛrǝŋ, kɛrɛ haŋ ɛlɔkɔ tǝgba tǝsas tɔfɔt kǝtǝma tamthǝdɛrǝŋ.
Tiyȧŋ rȧbȧy ra ro riyana rǝ bȧlȧnɛ mɔ ubȧy ulɔm ɔwe yema lɔmǝsnɛ yi ɛbɔy yɔŋ.
Ma ɔ tǝp kǝlɔmǝs-e, a kȧrȧ ukin ro ŋɔŋ ɔwe ba kǝram kɔ ɛtalent ɛwul tɔfɔt.
Kɛrɛ ma ɔ te ba rǝka tǝ kǝrȧm-e, ɔmarki kɔŋ ɔ yamari kȧmȧ a thila kɔ, ɔrani kɔŋ-o, aŋwuth ŋɔŋ-o yi ara ɔ ba bɛ kȧmȧ ȧŋrȧm aŋ wur.
Tiyȧŋ ȧŋbɔy ɔ gbǝpsa, kɔ nɛmthɛnɛ kɔ, ɔ pa, Pa, muyu mi ɔwa i ti po ram mu bɛ.
Ka ȧney aŋ wop ɔmarki ka ȧŋbɔy ŋati, kɔ ter kɔ, ɔ tera kɔ sɔ rabei.
Kɛrɛ ȧŋbɔy ukin kati ɔ wur, kɔ fir ɔkos kɔŋ ȧbɔy ɔwe ba kǝram kɔ ɛsiliŋ kɛmɛ kin. Kɔ wop kɔ, ɔ tɔker kɔ ro bolo, ɔ pa, Ram mi ara mǝ ba kǝram mi.
Ka ɔkos kɔŋ ȧbɔy ɔ gbǝpsa ɔ nɛmthɛnɛ, kɔ pa, Muyu mi, ɔwa i ti ram mu.
Kɛrɛ ɔ selɔ hɛ, ɔ kɔ bot kɔ ka ȧŋseth ŋa tǝrǝŋka haŋ ɔ ram rabei rɔŋ.
Ma aŋkos ŋɔŋ ɛbɔy aŋ nənk ȧte po yɔnɛ-e, ȧney ȧbana aŋ wop ŋa, kaŋ der aŋ der aŋ tɔri ɔmarki ka ŋaŋ ȧte yɔnɛ bɛ.
Ka ɔmarki kɔŋ ɔ tela kɔ ro ŋɔŋ, ɔ pa, Munɔ, mun ȧbɔy ulǝs, i tera mu rȧbȧy araŋ bɛ, pǝkasifɛ mɔ nɛmthɛnɛ mi.
Munɔ, mǝ gbǝli hɛ sɔ ba ȧney ta ɔkos mu ȧbɔy-i, mɔ minɛȧŋ i ba mu ȧney-i?
Ka ɔmarki kɔŋ ɔ bansȧ, kɔ lȧnki kɔ kia aŋa mǝ thalǝr afǝm haŋ ɔ po ram bɛ ara ɔ ba tǝ kǝram.
Ya ɔKas kȧmi ro riyana mǝ ɔ yɔ nu sɔ bepi naŋ bɛ nǝ tera hɛ wuni o wuni ɔwɔnt kɔŋ ka ɛmerȧ ɛ nu.
Ka pǝ re yi ma Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ gbanthi ȧsim ȧte-e, ɔ wur ro Kalili, ɔ der ka ȧŋgbȧp ŋa ro Yudia aŋa yi ro Yɔrdan mɔri.
Ka suniya tǝbana tǝ tȧŋ kɔ, kɔ yeŋkǝs ŋa ri.
AŋFarisi sɔ aŋ der ro ŋɔŋ, kȧmȧ aŋ gbɔns kɔ, kaŋ pa, Pǝ yi ɔlompi ta wan duni tǝ kǝter ɔrani kɔŋ ta tȧy o tai-i?
kɔ wosa ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Nǝ tha karaŋ hɛ kǝpa kɔnɔ ɔwe bɛmpa ŋa kǝbi ka ɔtǝpɛr ɔ bɛmpa ŋa uruni dɛ yi ubɛra-i?
kɔ pa, Ta ȧŋsabu aŋe wan duni mǝ ɔ tey ɔkas kɔŋ yi ɔkara kɔŋ, ɔ gbapsa ɔrani kɔŋ; ɔwa ŋa ŋarǝŋȧŋ aŋ sǝkɛ adɛr ŋin-i?
Tiyȧŋ aŋ yi hɛ sɔ ŋarǝŋ kɛrɛ ukin. Ɔwa ȧrȧ Kuru ɔ po tɔsa der ɔkin-e, tȧ wuni ɔ te ri tɔsi.
kaŋ pa ro ŋɔŋ, kɔyɛŋ mǝn Mosis ɔ yamari tǝ kǝsɔŋ areka ŋa kǝsakanɛ dɛ yi tǝ kǝter kɔ-e?
kɔ pa ro rɔŋaŋ, Ta salata kabak ka nu ɛmerȧ Mosis ɔ selɔ nu tǝ kǝter aŋrani a nu, kɛrɛ ka katǝp pǝ yi hɛ yaŋ.
Ɔwa i kanɛ nu, wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ ter ɔrani kɔŋ, thambe ta ȧŋsabu ŋa kǝrǝp, ɔ kȧl nȧntȧ ulɔm-e, ɔ yɔ kǝrǝp. Kɔnɔ sɔ ɔwe mǝ nȧntȧ ɔbɛra ɔwe a ter-e, ɔ yɔ kǝrǝp.
Ka aŋkarande ŋɔŋ aŋ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Bepi ya pǝ yi kǝtɔŋ ka ɔwan duni yi ɔrani kɔŋ-e, pǝ tǝ yi naŋ fisa tǝ kǝte nȧntȧ.
kɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Afǝm bɛ tha mǝ gbǝli malanɛ ȧŋpa aŋe, thambe ŋaŋ ka aŋa a sɔŋ ŋi.

kotȧy-e afǝm agbȧy aŋ yi aŋa a kom yaŋ kǝbi ka ator ta aŋkara ŋaŋ; afǝm agbȧy alɔm aŋ yi aŋa afǝm a kǝpet aŋ gbai; ɔwa alɔm aŋ yi aŋa sǝkinɛ agbȧy salata rȧbȧy ra ro riyana. Kɔnɔ ɔwe gbǝli wop ti ta ɔ wop ti.
Ka a kȧrȧ afɛth ka Yisɔs kȧmȧ ɔ reŋ mȧta mɔŋ ro ŋaŋ, ɔ ramnɛ; kɛrɛ aŋkarande aŋ ŋal ŋa.
Kɛrɛ Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa, Ter aŋfɛth kȧmȧ aŋ der ro mi, te nu bɛnt ŋa, kotȧy-e, awunɔŋ ŋa ba rȧbȧy ra ro riyana.
kɔ reŋ ŋa mȧta mɔŋ, kɔ wur ri ɔ kɔnɛ.
Ɔwa kǝla, wuni kin ɔ der ro ŋɔŋ, kɔ pa, Karmɔkɔ, ko tȧy tǝfinɔ tǝ mǝ i yɔ kȧmȧ i sɔthɔ aŋesǝm thǝbana-e?
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa, kɔyɛŋ mǝ mǝ bont mi ufinɔ-e? Ukin gbo kɔnɔ yi ufinɔ, kɔnɔ yi mɔ Kuruȧŋ. Kɛrɛ bepi mǝ yema wɔŋ ka aŋesǝm, wop ɛthɔ.
kɔ yif kɔ, Ɛreke-e? Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa, Te dif, te yɔ kǝrǝp, te keya, te sɔŋ mǝseri ma rǝyem.
Yikis ɔkas ka mu yi ɔkara ka mu, ɔwa mǝ yi tǝ kǝbɔthǝr ɔfatanɛ ka mu mɔ mǝ bɔthǝrnɛ.
Ka ɔlaŋgba ɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Mȧtȧy ame bɛ i po wop kǝbi ka rafɛth ra mi. Ko i paŋ ras-e?
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Bepi mǝ yema yi ugbenthis-e, kɔnɛ mǝ thila ara mǝ ba, ɔwa mǝ sɔŋ ȧŋmɔnɛ. Mǝ tǝ ba kɛŋ ro riyana, ɔwa der, mǝ tȧŋ mi.
Kɛrɛ ma ɔlaŋgba ɔ tǝl ȧsim ȧte ɔ kɔnɛ yi ɔnɔsinɛ, ȧtesoma-e ɔ ba yɛt ɛgbathi.
Ka Yisɔs ɔ pa ka aŋkarande ŋɔŋ, Tɛntɛnɛ i kanɛ nu, tȧy tǝbaki mǝdɛr tȧŋ ta uyola tǝ kǝwɔŋ ka rȧbȧy ra ro riyana.
I kanɛ nu sɔ, tȧy tǝyai tȧŋ ta ȧyɔkmɛ tǝ kǝsɔnthɔs rafɔr ra ȧŋsɛni, pǝthasi uyola tǝ kǝwɔŋ ka rȧbȧy ra Kuru.
Ma aŋkarande ŋɔŋ aŋ tǝl ti-e, aŋ kabanɛ ɔthasǝr, kaŋ pa, Kanɛ thɔŋ mǝ gbǝli kisi-e?
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ kǝli ŋa tǝŋ, kɔ pa, Ka afǝm aŋfɔsɔ ŋati aŋ yi hɛ, kɛrɛ ka Kuru aŋfɔsɔ ŋati bɛ aŋ yi.
Ka Pitarȧŋ ɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Kǝla, saŋ sǝ po tey bɛ kȧmȧ sǝ tȧŋ mu; tiyȧŋ ko ȧrȧm ŋaŋ mǝ sǝ sɔthɔ-e?

Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa, Tǝ tɛntɛnɛ i kanɛ nu-e, ka ȧdȧru rǝfu ma ɔWan ka wuni mǝ ɔ yirȧ ka kawaŋ ka rȧbȧy ka aŋyiki ŋɔŋ-e, naŋ aŋa po tȧŋ mi, naŋ sɔ nǝ tǝ yirȧ ka tǝwaŋ ta rȧbȧy tɔfɔt tǝrǝŋ, nǝ tǝ thonkas ɛbɔnsɔŋ tɔfɔt yɛrǝŋ ya aŋIsrɛl,

Ɔwa wuni o wuni ɔwe po tey ɛseth, thalɔm awɔnt aruni, thalɔm awɔnt abɛra, thalɔm ukas, thalɔm ukara, thalɔm urani, thalɔm awuth, thalɔm tǝthɔf salata ȧŋes a mi-e, ɔ tǝ bȧr sɔthɔ mɔlɔ ma kǝtǝma kɛmɛ kin, ɔwa ɔ tǝ sɔthɔ sɔ aŋesǝm thǝbana.
Kɛrɛ agbȧthi aŋa yi ȧtɔtɔkɔ aŋ tǝ yi alǝpsɔ. Ɔwa aŋa yi alǝpsɔ aŋ tǝ yi ȧtɔtɔkɔ.
Ȧtesoma-e rȧbȧy ra ro riyana rǝ bȧlȧnɛ mɔ wuni ɔwe ba kǝfus, kɔ wur bǝth bǝth tǝ kǝyamɔ afǝm tǝ kǝyɔ mǝpanth ka akɔr kɔŋ ka yɛt ɛtɛp ɛgbam.
Ma ɔ po gbanɛ mɔlɔ yi aŋyɔ mǝpanth ta asiliŋ ta arey ŋin-e, ɔ som ŋa ka akɔr kɔŋ.
Ma ɔ wur ka aŋhawa aŋa bekȧ mǝsas-e, ɔ nənk alɔm aŋ tǝma ka ɔdɛr ɔthila kǝte ba mǝpanth.
kɔ pa ro rɔŋaŋ, Naŋ sɔ-e, kɔ nu ka mapanth ro kɔr, ɔwa i ti sɔŋ nu ara yi rǝlompi. Kaŋ kɔnɛ.
kɔ wur sɔ ka aŋhawa aŋa bekȧ tamthǝrukin yi tamthǝrɛŋanlɛ, kɔ yɔ yi sɔ.
Ka aŋhawa aŋa bekȧ tɔfɔt ŋin, ɔ wur sɔ-e, kɔ bǝp alɔm aŋ tǝma tǝma gbo, ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, kɔyɛŋ mǝ nǝ tǝma nɔ pali nǝ te yɔ mǝpanth-e?
kaŋ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Pǝkasifɛ wuni o wuni ɔ tha yamɔ hɛ su. Kɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Kɔnɛ nu sɔ ro kɔr, ɔwa ara yi rǝlompi, rǝ i ti sɔŋ nu.
Ɔwa ma rȧfɔy rǝ bek-e, ɔmarki ka akɔr ɔ pa ka ȧŋbɔy ŋɔŋ ubaki, Tela aŋyɔ mǝpanth, mǝ ram ŋa aŋkala ŋaŋ, mǝ tǝp ka ɔlǝpsɔ mǝ gbanthi ka ɔtɔtɔkɔ.
Ka ŋaŋ aŋa lǝpsɔ wɔŋ ka mapanth aŋ der, aŋ sɔthɔ ukin o kin asiliŋ.
Ma aŋtɔtɔkɔ aŋ der-e, aŋ nanɛ kǝpa a tǝ bȧrȧ ŋa, kɛrɛ ŋaŋ sɔ aŋ sɔthɔ ukin o kin asiliŋ.
Maŋ wop ŋi-e, aŋ fɔfthənɛ ta ɔwe yamɔ ŋa,
aŋ pa, Aŋe-e, ŋa lǝpsɔ wɔŋ ka mapanth, aŋ bulɔ gbo ahawa ŋin. Ɔwa mǝ po yɔ ŋa aŋ thǝnanɛ yi saŋ-e, saŋ aŋa thɔrɔ ɔlel ka ɔwon wa ȧŋrey.
Kɛrɛ ɔ wosa, ɔ pa ka ukin ka ŋaŋ, Yathki, i yɔ hɛ mu ɔlǝs. Sǝ gbanɛ hɛ yi munɔ ta asiliŋ-i?
Gbasi ara yi ara mu, mǝ kɔnɛ. Mȧselɔ ma mi miyɛŋ tǝ kǝsɔŋ aŋlǝpsɔ aŋe mɔ mǝ i po sɔŋ mu.
Pǝ lomp hɛ ta ȧtȧ mi tǝ kǝyɔ mɔ mǝ i yema yi akɛŋ ka mi-i? thalɔm mǝ ba kǝtut ta mafinɔ ma mi-i?
Tiyȧŋ aŋlǝpsɔ aŋ tǝ yi ȧtɔtɔkɔ ɔwa aŋtɔtɔkɔ aŋ tǝ yi alǝpsɔ. Kotȧy-e a tela agbȧthi, kɛrɛ a thith athȧn.
Ɔwa ma Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ bɔ kɔ ro Yerusalɛm-e, ɔ gbasi aŋkarande tɔfɔt ŋarǝŋ rayɛr ka aroŋ, kɔ pa ro ŋaŋ,
Ɔwa sǝ kɔ ro Yerusalɛm. A tǝ lȧnki ɔWan ka wuni ka aŋfode ȧbana yi aŋkarmɔkɔ ɔwa a tǝ sɔŋ kɔ mǝtheri tǝ kǝfi.
Aŋ tǝ lȧnki kɔ ka tȧbona tǝlɔm kȧmȧ aŋ sel kɔ, ɔwa aŋ tǝ sap kɔ, aŋ tǝ tȧŋ kɔ ka kǝnt kǝpǝŋkinɛ. Ɔwa ka ȧŋrey aŋa bekȧ mǝsas-e, ɔ tǝ yokanɛ.
Ka ɔkara ka aŋwuth ŋa Sɛbidi ɔ der ka Yisɔs yi aŋwuth ŋɔŋ aruni, kaŋ bȧtho kɔ, kɔ tholir kɔ tȧy.
kɔ pa ka ɔya, Ko mǝ yema-e? Ka ɔya ɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Yamari kȧmȧ aŋwuth a mi aruni ŋarǝŋ aŋe aŋ yirȧ, ukin ka kȧdiyɔ ka mu, ɔwa ukin ka kȧmɛrɔ ka mu ka rȧbȧy ra mu.
Kɛrɛ Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ wosa ɔ pa, Nǝ tɛ hɛ ȧte nǝ yif. Nǝ gbǝli mun ka ampɔthi mǝ i re mun-i? A gbǝli baftays nu yi ȧŋbaftisəm aŋa a baftays mi-i? kaŋ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Sǝ gbǝli.

kɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Tɛntɛnɛ nǝ tǝ mun ka ampɔthi a mi, ɔwa a tǝ baftays nu yi ȧŋbaftisəm aŋa a baftays mi. Kɛrɛ tǝ kǝyira ka kȧdiyɔ kȧmi yi ka kȧmɛrɔ ka mi-e, tȧy ta mi tǝ kǝsɔŋ thahɔ, kɛrɛ a tǝ sɔŋ ti ka ŋaŋ ta aŋa ɔKas kȧmi ɔ bɛnɛ ti.
Ma aŋtɔfɔt aŋ tǝl ti-e, pǝ bansȧnɛ ŋa ta aŋwɔnt ŋarǝŋ.
Kɛrɛ Yisɔs ɔ tela ŋa ro ŋɔŋ, kɔ pa, Nǝ tȧrȧ kǝpa aŋbȧki ŋa tȧbona tǝlɔm aŋ gbǝka ŋa, ɔwa aŋfǝm ŋaŋ ȧbana aŋ yɔ ŋa afɔsɔ.
Kɛrɛ ya tha mǝ pǝ yi kǝtɔŋ ka nu. Wuni o wuni ɔwe yema yi ubana kǝtɔŋ ka nu, ta ɔ yi ȧbɔy a nu.
Ɔwa wuni o wuni ɔwe yema yi utɔtɔkɔ, ta ɔ yi utar ka nu;
mɔ mǝ ɔWan ka wuni ɔ te der kȧmȧ a yɔna kɔ, kɛrɛ tǝ kǝyɔna afǝm, dɛ yi tǝ kǝsɔnd aŋesǝm ŋɔŋ tǝ kǝbani afǝm alai.
Maŋ wur kǝyɛfǝ ro Yɛriko-e, runiya rǝbana rǝ tȧŋ kɔ.
Ɔwa afǝm afith ŋarǝŋ aŋ yirȧ ro roŋ rayɛr, ma aŋ tǝl kǝpa Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ thas-e, aŋ sel ɛrɔŋ, aŋ pa, Pa, ba su ȧney, munɔ ɔwan ka Debid.
Ka ȧruniya rǝ ŋal ŋa kȧmȧ aŋ taŋk, kɛrɛ aŋ bȧr sel ɛrɔŋ, aŋ pa, Pa, ba su ȧney, munɔ ɔwan ka Debid.
Ka Yisɔs ɔ tǝma son, ɔ tela ŋa ɔ pa, Ko nǝ yema i yɔna nu-e?
kaŋ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Pa, kȧmȧ a kanthi ɛfɔr ɛ su.
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ ba ŋa ȧney, ɔ gboŋ ɛfɔr yaŋ. Ɔwa ka ɔlɛmp wati aŋ sɔthɔ kakǝli ka ŋaŋ, kaŋ tȧŋ kɔ.
Maŋ fatǝr ro Yerusalɛm-e, ɔwa aŋ bek ro Bɛthfeki ka kateŋ ka Ɔlif-e, Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ som aŋkarande ŋarǝŋ,
ɔ pa ro rɔŋaŋ, Kɔ nu ka kagbɔm ȧke lomanɛ nu, ɔwa nǝ tǝ bǝp ri asofali ukotǝr, yi ɔwan kɔŋ ufɛth. Sǝli ŋa nu kȧmȧ nǝ kȧrȧ ŋa ro mi.
Bepi wuni o wuni ɔ pa rim ro rɔnu, pa nu, ƆMariki kɔnɔ yema ŋa, kɛrɛ ɔ tǝ kȧl somra ŋa.
Ȧte bɛ tǝ po yi kȧmȧ ȧrim ra ɔnȧbi rǝ lasǝr ara pa,
Kanɛ nu ɔwan ubɛra ka ro Sayɔn, Kǝli ɔbȧy ka mu ɔ der ro rɔmu, Uthɔfǝl bɛm, ɔ rensa asofali, Asofali ufɛth.
Ka aŋkarande aŋ kɔnɛ, aŋ yɔ mɔ mǝ Yisɔs ɔ kanɛ ŋa,
kaŋ kȧrȧ aŋsofali yi ɔwan kɔŋ ufɛth, kaŋ reŋ ŋa ȧsuma taŋ, kɔ yirȧ rokɔm kati,
Ka agbȧthi ka ȧruniya aŋ rɛn ȧsuma taŋ ro roŋ. Alɔm aŋ gbǝk mara ka ɛyint-e, kaŋ rɛn ma ro roŋ.
Ka ȧsuniya ȧte yi kɔ rodi yi ŋaŋ aŋa tȧŋ kɔ, aŋ sel ɛrɔŋ, kaŋ pa, Hosana ka ɔwan ka Debid. Uruba wɔŋ ɔwe der ka ȧŋes ŋa ɔMarki, Hosana ka rokɔm kɔm bɛ!
Ma ɔ po bek ro Yerusalɛm-e, kȧpet bɛ kǝ yagba, kǝ pa, Kanɛ ɔwe-e?
Ka ȧsuniya tǝ pa, Yisɔsȧŋ, ɔnȧbi ka ro Nasarɛth ake ro Kalili, kɔnɔȧŋ.
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ wɔŋ ka ȧŋseth ŋa Kuru, kɔ wurɔ ŋa bɛ aŋa thila dɛ yi aŋa wais ka ȧŋseth ŋa Kuru, kɔ thuŋkli ɛthebul ya aŋsinkar ɛkala, dɛ yi ɔyira wa ŋaŋ aŋa thila tǝpǝrǝm.
kɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, A po gbal kǝpa, Ȧŋseth a mi a tǝ bont ŋi ȧseth ŋa kǝramnɛ, kɛrɛ naŋ-e, nǝ po sǝki ŋi kǝyanka ka akey.
Ɔwa aŋfith yi antǝtkɛ aŋ der ro ŋɔŋ ka ȧŋseth ŋa Kuru, kɔ yeŋkǝs ŋa.
Ma aŋkərbomp kǝtɔŋ ka aŋfode yi aŋkarmɔkɔ aŋ nənk mȧtȧy mǝkabanɛ ama ɔ yɔ-e, yi aŋfɛth aŋa lensir ka ȧŋseth ŋa Kuru, aŋ pa, Hosana ka ɔwan ka Debid; pǝ bansȧnɛ ŋa,
kaŋ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Mǝ tǝl ȧte aŋe aŋ pa-i? Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Aŋko; naŋ nǝ la hɛ karaŋ kǝpa, Mǝ po gbenthis kǝthɔkǝs kǝwur ka tasǝŋ ta afɛth yi tǝlɛnth-i?
kɔ tey ŋa, ɔ wur ro pet ɔ kɔnɛ ro Bɛthani, kɔ yianɛ ri.
Ɔwa ka rǝbǝth rǝlɔm mɔ mǝ ɔ kȧl ro pet-e, dor rǝ wop kɔ.
Ma ɔ nənk ŋǝnt ŋa aŋgbɔnɔ ro roŋ dayɛr-e, ɔ fatǝr ŋi, kɛrɛ ɔ bǝp hɛ ri koko pǝthas gbo ɛbɔpǝr son, kɔ kanɛ ŋi, Ta akomi aŋ te sɔ wur mu thȧnkȧŋ. Ka ɔlɛmp wati aŋǝnt ŋa aŋgbɔnɔ aŋ wela.
Ma aŋkarande aŋ nənk ti-e, aŋ kabanɛ, kaŋ pa, To som aŋǝnt ŋa aŋgbɔnɔ aŋ wela lɛmp-e?

Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ wosa, ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Tɛntɛnɛ i pa ro nu, Bepi nǝ ba kǝlanɛ-e, ɔwa nǝ sikɛ hɛ-e, nǝ ba hɛ gbo kǝyɔ ȧte i yɔ aŋǝnt ŋa aŋgbɔnɔ-e, kɛrɛ hali nǝ pa ka kateŋ ake, Yokanɛ mǝ fithanɛ ro baŋ, pǝ tǝ yɔnɛ.
Ɔwa koko ara mǝ nǝ yif rǝ kǝramnɛ, bepi nǝ lanɛ-e, nǝ tǝ sɔthɔ.
Ma ɔ po wɔŋ ka ȧŋseth ŋa Kuru-e, aŋkərbomp kǝtɔŋ ka aŋfode yi aŋbȧki ŋa aŋfǝm aŋ der ro ŋɔŋ mɔ mǝ ɔ thǝksa, kaŋ pa, Rǝ afɔsɔ areke mǝ mǝ yɔ mȧtȧy ame-e, ɔwa kanɛ sɔŋ mu aŋfɔsɔ aŋe-ȧ?
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ wosa ɔ pa, Minɛ sɔ i ti yif nu ȧyif ŋin. Bepi nǝ gbakia mi ŋi-e, minɛ sɔ i ti tɔri nu aŋfɔsɔ aŋa mǝ i yɔ mȧtȧy ame.
Ȧŋbaftisəm ŋa Yɔn-e, reke aŋ wur-e? Ka Kuru thalɔm rǝ afǝm-i? kaŋ fɔfǝranɛ aŋ pa, Bepi sǝ pa, Ka Kuru-e, ɔ tǝ pa ro rɔsu, Ɔwa kɔyɛŋ nǝ te lanɛ kɔ-e?
Bepi sǝ pa, Rǝ afǝm, sǝ nesa ȧruniya, kotȧy-e afǝm bɛ aŋ wop Yɔnȧŋ mɔ unabi.
kaŋ wosȧnɛ Yisɔsȧŋ, aŋ pa, Sǝ tɛ hɛ. Ka Yisɔs ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Minɛ sɔ i tɔri hɛ nu aŋfɔsɔ aŋa mǝ i yɔ mȧtȧy ame.
Kɛrɛ to naŋ nǝ nanɛ-e? Wuni lɔm ɔ ba awuth aruni ŋarǝŋ. Ɔ der ka ɔtɔtɔkɔ, kɔ pa, Wan kȧmi, kɔ thonɔŋ yɔ mǝpanth ro kɔr kȧmi.
kɔ lasi ɔ pa, I selɔ hɛ; kɛrɛ kǝdarǝŋ kati ɔ siŋkar ȧŋmerȧ ŋɔŋ, ɔ kɔnɛ.
kɔ der ka ɔwe bekȧ ŋarǝŋ-e, kɔ pa yaŋ sɔ, kɔ wosa ɔ pa, I selɔ Pa; kɛrɛ ɔ kɔ hɛ bɛ.
Ka ŋa ŋarǝŋ aŋe-e, kanɛ yɔ mȧselɔ ma ɔkas kɔŋ-e? kaŋ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Ɔtɔtɔkɔ. Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Tɛntɛnɛ i kanɛ nu kǝpa aŋthoŋkla ɛfȧk yi aŋbɛra arǝpi aŋ tǝ mɔtha nu wɔŋ ka rȧbȧy ra Kuru.
kotȧy-e Yɔnȧŋ ɔ der ro nu ka aroŋ da mǝlompi, ka nǝ te kɔ lanɛ; kɛrɛ aŋthoŋkla ɛfȧk yi aŋbɛra arǝpi aŋ lanɛ kɔ. Ɔwa naŋ-e, hali ma nǝ nənk ti-e, nǝ siŋkar hɛ ɛmerȧ ɛ nu kȧmȧ nǝ lanɛ kɔ.
Tǝl nu alomɔ alɔm. Ukas ka aseth ɔ yi ri ɔwe tɛp kɔr ka yɛt ɛgbam, kɔ gbǝtɔr ki ȧkunk-e, ɔ bɛmpa dɛr ɔyɛkǝs, ɔ tǝmǝr ri aseth abɔli rǝkɔm, kɔ sɔŋ ki rǝ ȧbȧf, ɔ kɔnɛ rǝ athɔf alɔm.
Ɔwa ma ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋa mȧkomi aŋ fat-e, ɔ som ɛbɔy yɔŋ ka aŋbȧf tǝ kǝsɔthɔ mȧkomi mɔŋ.
Ka aŋbȧf aŋ gbasi ɛbɔy yɔŋ aŋ sap ukin, aŋ dif ukin, aŋ lǝmǝs ulɔm mǝsar.
kɔ kȧl som ɛbɔy alɔm agbȧthi athasi aŋtɔtɔkɔ. Kaŋ kȧl sɔ yɔ ŋa yaŋ.
Kǝdarǝŋ kati ɔ som ɔwan kɔŋ uruni ro ŋaŋ, ɔ pa, Aŋ tǝ tȧrȧ ɔwan kȧmi uruni rǝka.
Kɛrɛ aŋbȧf maŋ nənk ɔwan-e, aŋ fɔfǝranɛ, kaŋ pa, Ɔwe mǝ re ba akɛŋ, kɔnɔ ɔwe. Der, maŋ dif kɔ nu kȧmȧ sǝ gbasi akɛŋ kɔŋ.
kaŋ wop kɔ, aŋ wurɔ kɔ ro kɔr, kaŋ dif kɔ.
Tiyȧŋ ma ɔmarki ka akɔr ka ɛyɛt ɛgbam ɔ der-e, to mǝ ɔ yɔ aŋbȧf ŋati-e?
kaŋ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Ɔ tǝ dif aŋfǝm alǝs ŋati kǝdif kǝlǝs, ɔ tǝ sɔŋ akɔr ka ɛyɛt ɛgbam rǝ ȧbȧf alɔm aŋa mǝ sɔŋ kɔ mȧkomi ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati.
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Nǝ la hɛ karaŋ ka mȧgbal mǝsǝm, Aŋsar aŋa aŋsȧl aŋ pɛnsa-e, gbeŋ, a sǝki ŋi rȧbomp ra ȧŋkoŋ. Aŋe aŋ wur ka Kuru, Ɔwa tȧy tȧŋ ka ɛfɔr ɛ su-i?
Tiyȧŋ i pa ro rɔnu, A tǝ nɔy nu rȧbȧy ra Kuru, a tǝ sɔŋ ri abona aŋa mǝ wurɔ mȧkomi mati.
Ɔwa wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ fumpɔ ka aŋsar aŋe a tǝ simǝth kɔ yɛkǝth yɛkǝth. Kɛrɛ wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ aŋ fumpǝr-e, aŋ tǝ gbǝm kɔ sir mɔ kǝbof.
Ma aŋkərbomp kǝtɔŋ ka aŋfode yi aŋFarisi aŋ tǝl ɛlomɔ yɔŋ-e, aŋ sɔthnɛ kǝpa ɔ fɔf ta ȧte ŋaŋ.
Kɛrɛ maŋ thɛns tǝ kǝwop kɔ-e, aŋ nesa ȧsuniya, kotȧy-e aŋ gbasi kɔ tǝ kǝyi unabi.
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ wosa, ɔ fɔf ro ŋaŋ rǝ ɛlomɔ, kǝpa ye,
Rȧbȧy ra ro riyana rǝ yi mɔ ubȧy ulɔm ɔwe bɛmpa met ma kanantǝ ta ɔwan kɔŋ uruni,
kɔ som ɛbɔy yɔŋ tǝ kǝtela ŋaŋ aŋa a muti ka amet ma kanantǝ. Kɛrɛ aŋ selɔ hɛ der.
kɔ kȧl som ɛbɔy alɔm, ɔ pa, Kanɛ ŋaŋ aŋa a muti kǝpa ye, Kǝla, i po bɛnɛnɛ aŋfantha a mi. A po fai tana ta mi yi ɛsɛm ɛ mi ɛboy, ɔwa ɛyɛt bɛ ɛ po bɛnɛnɛ. Der nu ka amet ma kanantǝ.
Kɛrɛ aŋ sai ti, aŋ kɔnɛ ka ȧtȧy taŋ, ukin ka akɔr kɔŋ, ulɔm ka mȧsǝkinɛ mɔŋ.
Ɔwa aŋa tia-e, aŋ lɛsa ɛbɔy yɔŋ, kaŋ sambos ŋa, aŋ difǝth ŋa.
Ma ɔbȧy ɔ tǝl ti-e, ɔ bansȧ, ɔ somra asǝfȧ tɔŋ, kɔ dim aŋfǝm aŋa difǝth ɛbɔy yɔŋ, kɔ thɔi kȧpet ka ŋaŋ.
Kǝdarǝŋ kati ɔ pa ka ɛbɔy yɔŋ. A po bɛnɛnɛ aŋfantha ta kanantǝ, kɛrɛ aŋa a muti-e, aŋ yi hɛ amari ti.
Tiyȧŋ kɔ nu ka asoŋ tǝsakanɛ kȧmȧ nǝ muti ŋaŋ bɛ aŋa mǝ nǝ bǝp ri ka amet ma kanantǝ.
Ɛbɔy ŋati aŋ kɔnɛ ka asoŋ tǝsakanɛ, kaŋ thoŋkla aŋa aŋ bǝp ri bɛ, aŋlǝs-o, aŋfinɔ-o; ka ȧŋseth ro amet ma kanantǝ mǝ yi aŋ la yi afǝm.
Ma ɔbȧy ɔ wɔŋ tǝ kǝkǝli aŋa a muti-e, ɔ nənk ri wuni ɔwe te wɔŋ ruma ra kanantǝ.
kɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Yathki, kɔyɛŋ mǝ mǝ wɔŋ nɔ, mǝ te wɔŋ ruma ra kȧnȧntȧ-e? kɔ taŋk thǝm.
Ka ɔbȧy ɔ pa ka ɛbɔy yɔŋ, Sek kɔ nu mȧta yi ȧtȧtək, kȧmȧ nǝ fitha kɔ rokaŋ ka ȧŋsum, ro kǝkulɔ yi kǝŋȧkŋȧk ɛsek kǝ yi.
kotȧy-e a muti agbȧthi kɛrɛ a thith athȧn.
Ka aŋFarisi aŋ kɔnɛ aŋ nǝŋkanɛ to mǝ aŋ gbǝli sapǝs kɔ ka kafɔf kɔŋ.
kaŋ som aŋkarande ŋaŋ yi aŋHerodian ro ŋɔŋ, aŋ pa, Karmɔkɔ sǝ tȧrȧ kǝpa mǝ yi utǝteŋ, ɔwa mǝ thǝksa aroŋ da Kuru tǝteŋ. Mǝ ba hɛ agbȧy kotȧy-e mǝ kǝli hɛ ȧder ra wuni.
Tiyȧŋ kanɛ su ba ȧte mǝ nanɛ. Pǝ yi ɔlompi tǝ kǝsɔŋ ɛfȧk ka Sisar-i, thalɔm pǝ lomp hɛ ti-i?
Kɛrɛ Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ nənk mȧlǝs maŋ, kɔ pa, kɔyɛŋ mǝ nǝ gbɔns mi naŋ amunafaki-i?
Tɔri mi nu aŋkala ŋa ɛfȧk. Kaŋ kȧrȧ kɔ akɔpǝr ŋin.
kɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Kanɛ ba mȧbȧlȧnɛ yi mȧgbal ame-e?
kaŋ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Sisarȧŋ. Kɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Ɔwa sɔŋ nu Sisarȧŋ mȧtȧy ma Sisar, ɔwa sɔŋ nu Kuru mȧtȧy ma Kuru.
Maŋ tǝl ȧte-e, aŋ kabanɛ, kaŋ tey kɔ, aŋ kɔnɛ.
Ka ȧŋrey ŋati gbeŋ, aŋSadusi aŋa pa kǝyokanɛ kǝ yi hɛ, aŋ der, kaŋ pa ro ŋɔŋ,
Karmɔkɔ, Mosis ɔ pa, Bepi wuni ɔ fi ɔ ba hɛ awuth-e, ɔwɔnt kɔŋ uruni ɔ ba tǝ kǝnantǝ ɔrani kɔŋ kȧmȧ ɔ komǝs awuth ta ɔwɔnt kɔŋ.
Ɔwa sǝ sa ba awɔnt aruni tamthǝdɛrǝŋ. Ka ɔtɔtɔkɔ ma ɔ nȧntȧ-e, ɔ fi, ɔwa ma ɔ te ba awuth-e, ɔ tey ɔrani kɔŋ ka ɔwɔnt kɔŋ.
Ya pǝ yi sɔ ɔwe bekȧ ŋarǝŋ, yi ɔwe bekȧ asas, haŋ kǝbek ka ɔwe bekȧ tamthǝdɛrǝŋ.
Ɔwa ɔbɛra ɔ fi kǝdarǝŋ ka ŋaŋ bɛ.
Tiyȧŋ, ka kȧyokanɛ, ureke kǝtɔŋ ka aŋtamthǝdɛrǝŋ mǝ ba ɔbɛra-e, ma pǝ yi ŋaŋ bɛ aŋ la po ba kɔ-e?
Kɛrɛ Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ wosa ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Nǝ yɛthȧ ma nǝ te tȧrȧ mȧgbal thalɔm aŋfɔsɔ ŋa Kuru.
kotȧy-e ka kȧyokanɛ aŋ nȧntȧ hɛ, ɔwa a sɔŋ hɛ kǝnantǝ, kɛrɛ aŋ yi gbo mɔ aŋmȧleka ro riyana.
Kɛrɛ ta kȧyokanɛ ka aŋfi-e, nǝ karaŋ hɛ ȧte Kuru ɔ pa ro nu mǝ ɔ pa,
Minɛ yi ɔKuru ka Ebraham, ɔKuru ka Aysak yi ɔKuru ka Yekɔb-i? Kuruȧŋ ɔ yi hɛ ɔKuru ka aŋfi kɛrɛ ɔka aŋkǝli.
Ma ȧsuniya tǝ tǝl ȧte-e, aŋ kabanɛ ta kathǝksa kɔŋ.
Ma aŋFarisi aŋ tǝl kǝpa Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ po yɔ aŋSadusi aŋ taŋk-e, aŋ thoŋklanɛ dɛr rɔkin.
Ka ukin ka ŋaŋ ɔwe tȧrȧ aŋthɔ ɔ yif kɔ ȧyif kȧmȧ ɔ mɛm kɔ, ɔ pa,
Karmɔkɔ, areke yi aŋyamari ȧbana thɔŋ bɛ ka aŋthɔ-e?
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Mǝ yi tǝ kǝbɔthǝr ɔMarki ɔKuru ka mu yi ȧŋmerȧ a mu bɛ, dɛ yi aŋesǝm a mu bɛ, dɛ yi ananɛ a mu bɛ.
Aŋe, ŋǝ yi aŋyamari ȧbana ȧtɔtɔkɔ ŋa aŋthɔ.
Ɔwa, aŋa bekȧ yɛrǝŋ-e aŋ bȧlȧnɛ ŋi, ŋi aŋe, Mǝ yi tǝ kǝbɔthǝr ɔfatanɛ ka mu mɔ mǝ mǝ bɔthǝrnɛ.
Ka ɛyamari yɛrǝŋ ɛye rǝ aŋthɔ yi ȧsim ta aŋnabi bɛ tǝ gbasa.
Ma aŋFarisi aŋ po thoŋklanɛ dɛr rɔkin-e, Yisɔs ɔ yif ŋa,
kɔ pa, To nǝ nanɛ ta Kraist-e? Wan uruni ka kanɛ-e? kaŋ pa ro ŋɔŋ, Ɔwan ka Debid.
kɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, To som Debidȧŋ, ka aŋfɔsɔ ŋa ɔYina ɔ tela kɔ Mariki ma ɔ pa,
ƆMariki ɔ pa ka ɔmarki kȧmi, Yirȧ ka kȧta kȧmi kǝdiyɔ Haŋ i bot aŋtheranɛ a mu roratha ka ȧtȧtək ta mu-e?
Bepi Debidȧŋ ɔ bont kɔ Mariki, to ɔ gbǝli yi ɔwan kɔŋ-e?
Ɔwa wuni o wuni ɔ gbǝli hɛ sɔ gbakia kɔ dim din. Ɔwa kǝtǝp ka ȧŋrey ŋati wuni o wuni ɔ mintha hɛ sɔ yif kɔ ȧyif o yif.
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ fɔfȧnɛ ȧsuniya yi aŋkarande ŋɔŋ,
kǝpa, Aŋkarmɔkɔ yi aŋFarisi aŋ yirȧ ka ɔyira wa Mosis.
Tiyȧŋ mȧtȧy bɛ ama aŋ yamari nu-e, yɔ, ɔwa wop ma nu. Kɛrɛ te nu tansanɛ mȧyɔs maŋ, kotȧy-e aŋ pa kɛrɛ aŋ yɔ hɛ.
Aŋ sek ɛlik ɛlel ɛtuy gbanɛ, aŋ bot yi ka tȧkǝnkla ta aŋfǝm, kɛrɛ ŋaŋ ŋanɛ aŋ yema hɛ borȧ yi hali yi ȧsel ŋaŋ ŋin.
Mȧyɔs maŋ bɛ aŋ yɔ ma kȧmȧ afǝm aŋ nənk ma. Aŋ bondǝs mȧbani maŋ, aŋ bondǝs ɛlɛmpɛ ya ȧsuma taŋ.
Aŋ bɔthǝr ɔdɛr ɔtɔtɔkɔ ka ɛmet, dɛ yi ɔyira ɔfinɔ ka ɛseth ɛgbanɛ,
yi ɛkori ka ɔdɛr ɔthila dɛ yi kȧmȧ aŋfǝm aŋ bont ŋa Karmɔkɔ.
Te nu selɔ a bont nu Karmɔkɔ, kotȧy-e ukin kɔnɔ yi ɔkarmɔkɔ ka nu, kɔnɔ yi Kraistȧŋ. Na bɛ nǝ yi awɔnt.
Te bont wuni o wuni nɔru ukas ka nu, kotȧy-e ukin kɔnɔ yi ɔKas ka nu, kɔnɔ yi ro riyana.
Te selɔ a bont nu amarki kotȧy-e ukin kɔnɔ yi ɔMarki ka nu, kɔnɔ yi Kraistȧŋ.
Ɔwe yi ubana thɔŋ bɛ kǝtɔŋ ka nu-e, ɔ tǝ yi ȧbɔy a nu.
Ɔwa wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ ŋatanɛ, a tǝ thora kɔ, ɔwa wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ thoranɛ, a tǝ ŋata kɔ.
Kɛrɛ mɔnɛ ro nu naŋ akarmɔkɔ yi aFaresi, amunafaki! Ȧtesoma-e nǝ kantha rȧbȧy ra ro riyana ka aŋfǝm. Kotȧy-e naŋ nǝ wɔŋ hɛ, ɔwa nǝ selɔ hɛ ŋaŋ aŋa yema tǝ kǝwɔŋ, aŋ wɔŋ.
Mɔnɛ ro nu naŋ akarmɔkɔ yi aFaresi, amunafaki! Ȧtesoma-e nǝ lǝsǝr ɛseth ya ȧŋbora, ɔwa rǝ kǝkɔnthɔsnɛ nǝ ramnɛ kǝramnɛ kǝbɔli. Tiyȧŋ na mǝ tha sɔthɔ mǝtheri mǝlel.
Mɔnɛ ro nu naŋ akarmɔkɔ yi aFaresi, amunafaki! Ȧtesoma-e nǝ kɔth kɔth ro baŋ yi ro gbaŋ tǝ kǝlȧfthi ȧŋmerȧ ŋa wuni kin. Ɔwa ma ɔ po lȧfthɛ-e, nǝ sǝki kɔ wan ka yahanama marǝŋ marǝŋ pǝthasi nu.
Mɔnɛ ro nu naŋ atǝmȧ kǝdi aŋfith! Nǝ pa, Wuni o wuni ɔwe gbiŋ ka ȧŋseth ŋa Kuru-e, tȧy thahɔ, kɛrɛ wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ gbiŋ ka mabɔŋɔ ma ȧŋseth ŋa Kuru-e, ɔ sekǝrnɛ.
Na apǝŋk dɛ yi afith. Areke thas-e, mabɔŋɔ thalɔm ȧŋseth ŋa Kuru aŋa sǝmǝs mȧbɔŋɔ-e?
Ɔwa nǝ pa sɔ, Wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ gbiŋ ka ȧŋbɛsɛ, tȧy thahɔ, kɛrɛ wuni o wuni ɔwe mǝ gbiŋ ka ȧŋboya rokɔm kati-e, ɔ sekǝrnɛ.
Na apǝŋk dɛ yi afith. Areke thas-e, ȧŋboya thalɔm ȧŋbɛsɛ aŋa sǝmǝs ȧŋboya-e?
Tiyȧŋ, ɔwe mǝ gbiŋ ka ȧŋbɛsɛ-e, ɔ gbiŋ ka ȧŋbɛsɛ dɛ yi ka ɛyɛt bɛ ɛyɛ yi rokɔm kati.
Ɔwa ɔwe mǝ gbiŋ ka ȧŋseth ŋa Kuru-e, ɔ gbiŋ ka ȧŋseth dɛ yi ka kɔnɔ ɔwe yirȧ ri.
Ɔwa ɔwe mǝ gbiŋ ka ȧriyana-e, ɔ gbiŋ ka kawaŋ ka rȧbȧy ra Kuru, yi ka kɔnɔ ɔwe yirȧ ri.

Mɔnɛ ro nu, naŋ akarmɔkɔ yi aFaresi, amunafaki! Pǝkasifɛ nǝ sɔŋ ɛyaka ya ɛsoro yi anisi, dɛ yi kamin, kɛrɛ nǝ tey kǝyɔ mȧtȧy mǝbana ma aŋthɔ, pǝ yi mɔ-e kǝgbǝk ɛpa ɔlompi, kǝba ȧney dɛ yi kǝlanɛ. Nǝ yi tǝ kǝyɔ ȧte, ɔwa pǝ mar hɛ nǝ tey talɔm.
Naŋ atǝmȧ kǝdi afith, nǝ sais mȧnt tǝ kǝwura amǝnthǝl, kɛrɛ nǝ mer ȧyɔkmɛ.
Mɔnɛ ro nu, naŋ akarmɔkɔ yi aFaresi, amunafaki! kotȧy-e nǝ yak ampɔthi yi ȧŋbɔl romuth, kɛrɛ rokor ɛ la yɛt ɛnɔy rȧ ȧfɔsɔ yi mǝfela mǝlǝs.
Munɔ ɔFaresi ufith, mɔtha gbǝrans rokor ka ampɔthi yi ȧŋbɔl, kȧmȧ kamuth kati sɔ kǝ yi kǝgbǝraŋ.
Mɔnɛ ro nu, naŋ akarmɔkɔ yi aFaresi, amunafaki! Ȧtesoma-e nǝ bȧlȧnɛ mɔ tǝboma tǝfera ȧte tɔrinɛ ɔfinɔ romuth, kɛrɛ rokor tǝ la tǝbanth ta afǝm afi, yi mǝnɔkɔ bɛ.
Ya pǝ yi sɔ mɔ naŋ, nǝ tɔrinɛ nɔru kǝyi na alompi ka aŋfǝm, kɛrɛ rokor nǝ la rǝmunafaki yi mǝkǝnȧ.
Mɔnɛ ro nu, naŋ akarmɔkɔ yi aFaresi, amunafaki! Pǝkasifɛ nǝ bɛs taboma ta aŋnabi, ɔwa nǝ yesi tapali ta aŋlompi,
nǝ pa, Bepi sǝ yi naŋ thǝpaŋ ka aŋyamana ŋa aŋkas a su-e, sǝ gbǝli hɛ naŋ kasa yi ŋaŋ tǝ kǝloŋ mȧtir ma aŋnabi.
Tiyȧŋ nǝ gbakɛnɛ kǝpa nǝ yi awuth ŋa ŋaŋ aŋa difǝth Aŋnȧbi.
Tiyȧŋ, lasǝr nu aŋthuntha ŋa aŋkas a nu.
Naŋ ɛbok, naŋ rǝkomra ra ɛgbɔrɔ, to mǝ nǝ gbǝli kisi ka aŋthoŋka ŋa ro yahanama-e?

Te ba ti, kǝla, i somra nu anȧbi, afǝm atempi yi akarmɔkɔ; alɔm ŋati nǝ tǝ dif, nǝ tǝ tȧŋ ŋa rǝ tǝnt tǝpǝŋkinɛ, alɔm nǝ tǝ sapa ŋa nǝkɛt ka ɛseth ɛ nu ɛgbanɛ, nǝ tǝ bȧl ŋa kǝwur ka kǝpet kin kǝkɔ ka kǝlɔm,
kȧmȧ a reŋ nu mathɛkɛ ma mȧtir mǝpaŋi tȧy bɛ ama a loŋ ka ȧŋthɔf kǝtǝp ka mȧtir ma Ebɛl ɔlompi haŋ ka mȧtir ma Sakaraya ɔwan ka Barakaya ɔwe nǝ dif kǝtɔŋ ka ȧŋseth ŋa Kuru yi ȧŋbɛsɛ.
Tɛntɛnɛ i kanɛ nu, mȧtȧy ame bɛ mǝ ba tǝ kǝder ka rȧkomra are.

O Yerusalɛm, Yerusalɛm, munɔ mǝ difǝth aŋnabi, ɔwa mǝ lǝmǝs ŋa mǝsar aŋa a som ro mu, amɔlɔ ɛlɔkɔ naŋ i fela tǝ kǝthoŋkla aŋwuth a mu dɛr rɔkin, mɔ kȧbɛt mɔ thonkla aŋwuth ŋɔŋ ka ɛkufna yɔŋ ratha, kɛrɛ mǝ selɔ hɛ.
Kǝla, a tey ȧŋseth a mu yeŋ.
Tiyȧŋ i kanɛ nu, nǝ ba hɛ kǝnǝŋk mi kǝtǝp ka-ake haŋ nǝ pa, Uruba wɔŋ ɔwe mǝ der ka ȧŋes ŋa ɔMarki.
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ wur ka ȧŋseth ŋa Kuru tǝ kǝkɔnɛ, ɔwa aŋkarande aŋ der kȧmȧ aŋ tɔri kɔ mabɛmpa ma ȧŋseth ŋa Kuru.
Ka Yisɔs ɔ pa ro ŋaŋ, Nǝ nənk ɛye bɛ-i? Tɛntɛnɛ i kanɛ nu a ba hɛ kǝtey nɔ ȧsar ŋin rokɔm ka alɔm aŋa mǝ a te fak.
Ɔwa ma ɔ yirȧ ka kateŋ ka Ɔlif-e, aŋkarande ŋɔŋ aŋ der ro ŋɔŋ sɔy, aŋ pa, Kanɛ su ȧŋlɔkɔ aŋa mȧtȧy ame mǝ tǝ yi-e, dɛ yi ko mǝ yi ȧŋmisali ŋa kȧder ka mu, yi ɔthalnɛ wa raru-e?
Ka Yisɔsȧŋ ɔ wosa ɔ pa ro rɔŋaŋ, Botnɛ nu kȧmȧ wuni o wuni ɔ te nu yɛthǝs.
kotȧy-e agbȧthi aŋ tǝ der ka ȧŋes a mi, aŋ tǝ pa, Minɛ yi ɔKrayst, ɔwa aŋ tǝ yɛthǝs agbȧthi.
Ɔwa nǝ tǝ tǝl ta tǝtim yi tibari ta tǝtim, kɛrɛ ta pǝ te sɔmpa nu kotȧy-e mȧtȧy ame bɛ mǝ ba kǝyɔnɛ. Kɛrɛ ɔlǝpsɔ ɔ tha bek hɛ.
Abona aŋ tǝ yokar abona, rǝbai rǝ tǝ yokar rǝbai, dor rǝ tǝ yi, afithina ŋa tǝtu dɛ yi kǝyɛr ka ȧŋthɔf rǝ dɛr ɔgbaskɛ gbaskɛ.
Kɛrɛ mȧtȧy ame bɛ mǝ yi gbo ɔtǝpɛr wa ȧŋsɔmpanɛŋ.
Ka ȧŋlɔkɔ ŋati a tǝ lȧnki nu rǝ asɔmpanɛ, a tǝ dif nu, ɔwa tǝbona bɛ tǝ tǝ gbɛŋa nu salata ȧŋes a mi.
